Margarita is married and has five children.  She lives in her own house located in the city of El Alto’s Huayana Potosí zone.  Margarita has repaid previous loans excellently and qualifies for a new loan.  This is the second time her request has been sent to Kiva.

loans.use: to buy seasonal fruit.

loans.name: Hermelinda Del Rosario

texts.es:
Hermenegilda, vive con sus dos hijos de 18 y 12 años de edad, se dedica a la venta de productos medicinales, este negocio lo inicio hace varios años, debido a la necesidad de proveer y tener una fuente permanente de ingreso.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de medicinas naturales, en presentaciones de pastillas, jarabes, inyecciones, este préstamo le ayudara para poder diversificar el negocio, aumentando la posibilidad de vender.
La aspiración de ella es mejorar el negocio y generar mayores ingresos para sus hijos.
texts.en:
Hermenegilda lives with two of her children aged 18 and 12.  She has a business selling medicinal products that she started a number of years ago, as she needed to provide for her children and have a lasting source of income. 

She requests a loan to buy natural medications, in the form of pills, syrups, and injections.  This loan will help her to diversify her business and increase her sales.  

Hermenegilda aspires to improve her business and generate more income for her children.

loans.use: to buy medicines in the form of pills, syrups and injections

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase bales of new clothing to resell during the Christmas season.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: La señora Maria, tiene un puesto de ventas de artículos de cristal, como ser vasos, jarras, jarrones. El crédito lo requiere para aumento de capital, comprar más mercadería y aprovechar las ventas de navidad. Maria  es casada y tiene cuatro hijos. Vive en casa de sus suegros la misma queda ubicada en la zona 16  de Julio  de la Ciudad de El Alto. La cliente se encuentra muy satisfecha con los créditos que se le otorgaron anteriormente, que llegan a cinco, completamente pagados, ya que le ayudo a incrementar su capital y así tener mayores ingresos para la sustento de su familia . Es la tercera vez que su solicitud se canaliza hacia  Kiva.
texts.en: María has a stand where she sells crystal items like glasses, jars and jugs.  She needs the loan to increase capital and to buy more merchandise to take advantage of Christmas sales.  María is married and has four children.  She lives in her in-laws’ house which is located in the city of El Alto’s 16 de Julio zone.  She is very satisfied with the loans she’s gotten previously, which number five, completely repaid and which helped her increase capital to earn higher income for her family’s support.  This is the third time her request has been channeled toward Kiva.

loans.use: to buy glassware to sell during the Christmas season.

loans.name: Yudis Ismenia

texts.es:
Yudis, se dedica a una pupuseria, vive con su familia, su esposo y una hija, ella inicio con el negocio con el apoyo de su madre, ya que necesitaba una fuente de ingreso, trabajando desde su casa, por el momento su negocio marcha bien.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de maíz, quesillo, aceite, y otros productos que son necesarios para la pupuseria así como las gaseosas y jugos, la inversión le ayudara para tener todo lo necesario y trabajar de mejor manera con la clientela.
Su aspiración es tener casa propia, aparte de su familia, aumentar el negocio y que su familia tenga una vida más comoda.
texts.en: Yudis runs a pupuseria [cafe that makes and sells pupusas] for a living. She lives with her family, her husband and their daughter.  She started this business with her mother's help as she needed a source of income.  She is working from her house and right now, things are going well.  She is requesting a loan to buy corn, quesillo [soft cheese], oil and other products that she needs in her pupuseria such as soft drinks and juices.  The loan will help her to have all that she needs and work better with her customers.  Her dream is to have her own house, apart from her family, increase her business and that her family has a more comfortable life.

loans.use: purchase corn, quesillo, oil, soft drinks and juices.

loans.name: Neris William

texts.es:
Neris, vive con su madre y sus hermanos, la casa es familiar, él se dedica a la reparación de llantas, desde hace dos años trabaja en dicho negocio.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de tubos, pegamentos, y llantas, esta inversión le ayudará para continuar manteniendo su negocio y brindar un buen servicio.
La aspiración de Neris, es crecer en clientes y poderles proveer repuestos necesarios.
texts.en: Neris lives with his mother and siblings in their family home.  He has been repairing tires for a living for two years.  Currently, he is requesting a loan to buy tubes, glue and tires.  This will help him to continue maintaining his business and give good service.  Neris's goals are to grow his clientele and to be able to have the parts he needs on hand.

loans.use: purchase tubes, glue and tires.

loans.name: Pamela

texts.es: La señora Pamela,  se dedica a la venta de peluches por menor en una de las ferias más grandes de la ciudad de El Alto.  El crédito lo requiere para aumento de capital y así poner mas variedad para ofrecerla a su cliente aprovechando las fiestas de fin de año. Pamela  es soltera y  tiene tres hijos. Vive en casa de sus padres  la misma queda ubicada en la zona 16  de Julio  de la Ciudad de El Alto. Pamela ya ha solicitado anteriormente que su préstamo sea canalizado a través de Kiva, y ahora también así lo desea.
texts.en: Pamela sells stuffed toys at the "16 de Julio" street market in the city of El Alto.  She needs the loan to increase capital and have a wider variety available to offer her customers taking advantage of end of year festivities.  Pamela is single and has three children.  She lives in her parents’ house located in the city of El Alto’s 16 de Julio zone.  Pamela has previously asked that her loan be channeled through Kiva and she so desires again now.

loans.use: to buy a larger amount of stuffed toys.

loans.name: Magdalena

texts.en: Magdalena  lives in Kampala, Uganda.  She is married and has 5 children, all of whom are in school.  She also takes care of additional family members (elderly parents). Magdalena has a business of selling charcoal. She has been in this business for 1 year, and she works 7 days out of every week. Magdalena sells her products from home, by means of retail. Magdalena has requested a loan of 2000000 Ugandan Shillings from MCDT SACCO, which she will use to buy more bags of charcoal. She also generates additional income through rental rooms.The main business challenge(s) for Magdalena include seasonality, transportation and thieves. Her goals and aspirations for her business are to see her business grow to and become a wholesaler. Magdalena lives in a home that she owns; she has access to electricity and  piped water.  Her major monthly expenses include school fees and feeding the family.

loans.use: To buy more bags of charcoal

loans.name: Elena

texts.es: La señora Elena se dedica a la producción venta de comida y queques. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de insumos, como ser harina, frutas abrillantadas, pasas, nueces, almendras y azúcar, para aumentar su capital y por ende elevar el volumen de su producción y aprovechar la época de navidad para vender más queques y panetones. Elena  es casada y no tiene hijos. Vive en casa en alquiler  la misma queda ubicada en la zona de Villa Fátima  de la Ciudad de La Paz. Elena es cliente de Impro desde el año 2008 y esta es la primera vez que desea que su crédito se canalize a través de Kiva.
texts.en: Elena makes food and cakes.  She needs the loan to buy ingredients like flour, candied fruit, raisins, nuts, almonds and sugar to increase capital and thus increase production to take advantage of the Christmas season and sell more cakes and panettones.  Elena is married and has no children.  She lives in a rented house located in the city of La Paz’s Villa Fátima zone.  Elena has been an Impro client since 2008 and this is the first time she’s wanted her loan to be channeled through Kiva.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, nuts and almonds to make Christmas panettones.

loans.name: Rosa Maribel

texts.es:
Rosa, se dedica a vender mariscos, verdura, frutas, ella vive con su esposo y dos hijos, aprendió el trabajo por cuenta propia y lleva ocho años dedicándose a él, han logrado alcanzar experiencia y muchos conocidos dentro del comercio de mariscos.
Actualmente necesita de un préstamo para invertirlo en pescado fresco, camarones, verduras y frutas, además comprará una parte de ropa para la temporada que se acerca con esta inversión podrá fortalecer el negocio e incrementar el inventario de sus productos ofreciéndole a los clientes una mayor variedad y calidad.
La aspiracion de Rosa es comprarse un vehículo a futuro para poder trasladar toda la mercadería hacia el sitio de venta.
texts.en: Rosa sells seafood, vegetables and fruits for a living.  She lives with her husband and two children.  She learned this business on her own and has been doing it for eight years.  She has gained a lot of experience and has many contacts in the seafood business.  Currently, she needs a loan to invest in fresh fish, shrimp, vegetables and fruit.  She will also buy clothing for the coming season.  This investment will strengthen her business and increase her inventory so she can offer her customers more variety and better quality.  Rosa's goal is to buy a vehicle so she can transport her merchandise to the retail site.

loans.use: purchase fresh fish, shrimp, vegetables and fruits.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan, es empleado, vive con su familia y su esposa aún no tiene hijos, él trabaja desde hace dos años en la alcaldía municipal como auxiliar de registro familiar, este trabajo es su fuente de ingreso para mantener el hogar.
El solicita un préstamo para invertirlo en electrodomésticos para el hogar, ya que quiere realizar la inversión y suplir las necesidades personales y mejorar la condición de vida de él y su esposa; con el préstamo se sentirá satisfecho ya que tiene facilidades de pago y a la vez podrá contar con todo lo necesario en el hogar.
texts.en: Juan is employed.  He lives with his family and his wife and doesn't have any children yet.  He has been working for the municipal government as an assistant in the Family Records division for two years.  This is his main source of income for maintaining his household.  He is requesting a loan to purchase appliances for his household as he wants to make the investment and meet his personal needs and improve living conditions for him and his wife.  He will feel satisfied with the loan because he has the means to make his payments and at the same time will be able to have all that he needs for his household.

loans.use: purchase home appliances.

loans.name: Roxana Cristel

texts.es:
Roxana, vive con su esposo y dos hijos; ella se dedica a tender una pequeña granja su esposo el agricultor siembra maíz y frijol, lleva cuatro años dedicándose a estas actividades y le han permitido hasta el momento poder sobrellevar las obligaciones del lugar.
Ella solicita un préstamo para comprar pollos pequeños y aumentar la granja, además invertirá en insumos agrícolas como abona y herbicidas para los cultivos de su esposo; teniendo todo lo anterior podrá continuar en sus actividades cotidianas, oportunidad de mejorar sus ingresos a futuro.
Ella quiere mantenerse en el negocio por eso a través de préstamos espera crecer y fortalecer su hogar mejor disposición económica.
texts.en: Roxana lives with her husband and two children.  She runs a small farm for a living.  Her husband is a farmer and plants corn and beans.  She has been doing this for four years.  Until now this has allowed her to survive their obligations.  She is requesting a loan to buy young chickens and increase her business.  She will also invest in agricultural supplies such as fertilizer and herbicides for her husband's crops.  Having all of this will allow her to continue with her daily activities and give her the opportunity to improve her future earnings.  She wants to maintain her business through loans.  She hopes to grow and strengthen her household's financial situation.

loans.use: purchase young chickens.

loans.name: Saly

texts.fr: L'emprunteuse est une femme mariée.Elle vend des tissus et des produits de mercerie.Sa boutique, située en centre ville à coté des ateliers de tailleurs attire une grande clientèle et génère des revenus assez consistants.Ceci lui permet d'entretenir correctement ses quatre enfants et de soutenir son mari dans les dépenses de location et de paiement de factures d'eau et d'électricité.Pour augmenter son fonds de commerce et améliorer ainsi ses revenus, elle sollicite un prêt de 250000f pour acheter des tissus, des fils , des boutons et d'autres produits cosmétiques.Son ambition est d'ouvrir une seconde boutique.
texts.en: The borrower is a married woman. She sells fabric and notions. Her store is situated downtown, next to the tailor workshops, which attracts a large clientele and generates consistent income. This allows her to look after her four children correctly and to help her husband with the expenses, such as rent, water and electricity bills. To increase her business funds and also to improve her income, she is requesting a loan of 250000 francs to buy fabric, thread, buttons and other cosmetic products. Her goal is to open a second store.

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread, buttons and other cosmetic products

loans.name: Con Dios Adelante Al Progreso 1, 2 & 3 Group

texts.en:
Marina is the coordinator of her group, 'Con Dios adelante al progreso' 1, 2 & 3 (Forward Progress with God). Her group is located in the rural area of San Pedro de Macoris, surrounded by sugar cane fields. She makes her home here in a simple structure with her four children. She is a single mother.  Her most difficult challenge has been to raise her children and educate them.

Marina is excited to be seeking her 6th loan with Esperanza. She started doing business since almost 8 years ago, at first walking with a bag of clothing, cosmetics and shoes, and now after taking out some loans, she is selling chicken in her community. She plans to use this loan to invest in her business and she will buy some live chickens to start selling every day.  At the end of the day, after she finishes selling chicken, Marina starts working in her house cleaning or attending to her children. She thanks all of you for your support.

loans.use: to buy live chickens for sale

loans.name: Jose Alfredo

texts.es:
José, es ganadero, vive con su esposa y dos hijas, trabaja solamente él, lo inicio por cuenta propia, ya que le gusta mucho el trabajo de la agricultura y ganadería, no tiene un horario fijo y se dedica a él desde hace 10 años.
Él comprara una vaca, por eso solicita un préstamo, ya que tiene idea de ir aumentado su ganado, la compra le ayudara para mejorar y tener más oportunidades de superación.
La aspiración de él es tener casa propia y que su negocio sea cada día más prospero.
texts.en:
José is a livestock farmer.  He lives with his wife and two daughters and works alone.  He started his business on his own as he really enjoys farming and livestock raising.  He doesn't work fixed hours and has been in this business for 10 years.  José will buy a cow.  He is requesting a loan as he would like to increase the size of his herd.  This purchase will help him to improve and give him more opportunities to excel in life.

José's aspiration is to own his own home and for his business to continue thriving day by day.

loans.use: to buy a cow

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy products for her store

loans.name: Margarita Candelaria

texts.es:
Margarita, es empleada como maestra, en su vivienda administra una granja de cerdos, ella vive con su familia, su esposo y tres hijos, el negocio de ella comenzó con la idea de tener otra fuente de ingreso además de su empleo, su horario en la escuela es de 7:00am a 4:00pm.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de tres cerdos y la otra parte es para la reparación de su vehículo de uso familiar, este préstamo le ayudara tanto a aumentar la granja como para que su vehículo este en buenas condiciones. 
Su aspiración es manejar bien la inversión de este préstamo, teniendo mejoras  en su empleo y negocio.
texts.en:
Margarita is employed as a teacher and runs a hog farm from her home. She lives with her family: her husband and three children. She started her business with the desire to have another source of income on top of her profession. She works at school from 7:00 am to 4:00 pm.
She is requesting a loan for the purchase of three hogs. She will use the other part of the loan to expand the farm through, for example, keeping her vehicle in good shape.
Her goal is to manage this investment well and make improvements in her work and business.

loans.use: to buy three hogs.

loans.name: Ousmane

texts.fr: L'emprunteur est un jeune célibataire sans enfants.Il vend des journaux à domicile et dans les différents services publics et établissements privés de la ville.Il se lève très tôt le matin pour s'approvisionner auprès de l'unique grossiste de la ville pour revendre ses journaux au détail. Son commerce marche assez bien et lui permet de soutenir sa famille notamment pour les dépenses alimentaires, sanitaires et locatives. Pour renforcer son activité, il sollicite un prêt de 300 000f pour acheter des revues mensuels, des magazines de femmes et des  hebdomadaires de la mode en coiffure et couture.Son ambition est de louer une cantine en ville pour y établir une librairie.
texts.en: The borrower is a young single man without children. He sells newspapers door-to-door and in the different public and private establishments in town. He wakes up early each morning to stock up at the only wholesaler in town in order to resell his newspapers at retail. His business works pretty well and allows him to support his family, especially for their food, sanitary and rental expenses. To strengthen his business, he is requesting a loan of 300 000 francs to buy monthly magazines, women's magazines and weekly hair and fashion magazines. His goal is to rent a cafeteria in town where he will set up a bookstore.

loans.use: to buy monthly magazines, women's magazines, weekly hair and fashion magazines

loans.name: Maria Bartola

texts.es:
María, se dedica a la venta de frutas al mayoreo, vive con su esposo y sus hijos, ella tiene muchos años de estar en este negocio, lo inicio con su esposo, no hay un horario fijo y actualmente necesita dinero para invertirlo en mercadería.
Con el préstamo comprara frutas al mayoreo como las naranjas, guineos, manzanas, ya que ella les distribuye a pequeños comerciantes de frutas, permitiéndole este préstamo para que el negocio siga su curso normal.
La aspiración de María es tener siempre disponible mercadería para los clientes, vivir con su familia y trabajar juntos para poder properar.
texts.en:
María's business is selling fruit wholesale.  She lives with her husband and children and has been in this business for many years.  She started the business together with her husband.  María does not work regular hours and currently needs money to invest in buying merchandise.

María will use her loan to buy fruit such as oranges, bananas and apples wholesale.  She distributes the fruit to small-scale fruit vendors.  This loan will allow her business to continue working as normal.

María's aspirations are to always have merchandise available for her customers, to live with her family, and to work together so that they can do well and prosper.

loans.use: to buy oranges, bananas and apples

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase more textile material to make more clothes to resell.

loans.name: Jose Esteban

texts.es:
José, es peluquero, vive con su esposa y dos hijos, solamente él trabaja en la familia, aprendió la peluquería con unos amigos, trabaja en lo propio y tiene su puesto en el mercado municipal.
Él solicita un préstamo para la compra de herramientas para la peluquería, maquinas de cortar cabello, gelatinas, talcos, cremas, y todo lo demás que le ayuda a dar un buen servicio a los clientes, ya que con este dinero del préstamo espera atraer más clientes con su mejora en el negocio.
La aspiración de José es que sus clientes aumenten, ser más reconocido en la zona, mejorar las instalaciones en la peluquería.
texts.en:
José is a hairdresser who lives with his wife and two children.  He is the only one who works in his family.  He learned hairdressing with some friends.  He works for himself and has a stand in the town market.  He is requesting a loan to buy tools for his hairdressing business: clippers, gels, talcs, creams and everything else that helps him to provide good customer service.  With his loan money, he hopes to attract more customers by improving his business.

José's aspirations are to increase his number of customers, to become more well known in his area and to improve his hairdressing business.

loans.use: to buy clippers, gels, talcs and creams

loans.name: La Droiture Group

texts.fr:
Mme FANTA est la représentante du groupe LA DROITURE. Elle est  mariée  et mère de 03enfants. Le plus âgé  a 18ans et  le moins âgé a 15ans. Tous vont  à l’école. Elle a 05 personnes  en charge.

Elle vend des condiments depuis 06ans. Elle s’approvisionne  au  marché de pissy en ville. Ses clients sont  les femmes et hommes.

Elle veut  s’acheter 03 plats de gombo, 02kg de poisson sec, 03 plats d’arachide pour la fabrication de la patte d’arachide, 01 sac de savon kabakourou et 01 sac de savon citec.

 Mme utilise ses bénéfices pour aider à la scolarisation de ses enfants. Elle ambitionne  ouvrir une boutique.
texts.en:
Mme FANTA is the representative of the group called LA DROITURE. She is married and the mother of three children. The oldest is 18 and the youngest is 15 years of age. She is responsible for five persons.  

She has been selling condiments for six years. She buys her merchandise at the Pissy market in town. Her customers are women and men.  

She wants to buy three trays of okra, 2 kg of dried fish, 3 trays of peanuts to use for making peanut butter, 1 sack of "Kabakourou" soap and one sack of "Citec" soap. 

 Mme Fanta uses her profit to help cover the cost of school fees for her children. Her ambition is to own a shop.

loans.use: to buy okra, dried fish, peanuts for peanut butter, and soap for resale.

loans.name: Marvin Mauricio

texts.es:
Marvín, es agricultor, vive con su padre, es soltero, comenzó a trabajar la agricultura por su padre, quien le enseño desde muy joven, no tienen un horario fijo y en la actualidad está iniciando la nueva siembra.
Él solicita un préstamo para sacar la cosecha anterior y para prepararse con la nueva, trabajando  la tierra y de esta manera tendrá un mejor trabajo ya casi listo, esperando que sus cultivos sean provechosos.
La aspiración de él es adquirir cada vez más experiencia para ser un agricultor exitoso y apoyar a su padre en todo momento.
texts.en:
Marvín is a farmer.  He is single and lives with his father.  He started farming through his father who taught him how when he was very young.  They do not work regular hours and, right now, Marvín is starting to sow a new lot of crops.  He is requesting a loan to gather in his previous harvest and prepare the soil for sowing his new crops.  In this way, he will be able to better carry out his work and wait for his crops to be profitable.

Marvín's aspirations are to acquire more and more experience so that he can become a successful farmer and to support his father at all times.

loans.use: to gather in his harvest and start preparing the soil to sow his new crops

loans.name: Seynabou

texts.fr: L'emprunteuse est une femme mariée qui exerce dans le commerce de produits cosmétique, de sacs et de tissus.Elle est mère de cinq enfants dont les deux vont à l'école.Elle place ses produits auprès de ses clients et se fait payer au bout d'un ou de deux mois.Les revenus tirés de cette activité lui permettent de prendre en charge se propres besoins ainsi que ceux de sa famille. Elle prend entièrement en charge les frais de scolarité de ses deux filles. Pour augmenter son fonds de commerce, elle sollicite un prêt de 250000f pour acheter des sacs, des tissus ainsi que des produits cosmétiques.Son ambition est d'élargir son activité.
texts.en:
The borrower is a married woman who sells cosmetic products, handbags, and cloth. She is the mother of five children, of whom two attend school. She brings her products to her customers and gets paid at the end of a month or two. The income from this activity allows her to support herself and cover some expenses for her family. She is completely in charge of the school fees for her two daughters. 

To grow her working capital, she is requesting a loan of 250,000 francs to buy handbags, lengths of cloth, and cosmetic products. Her ambition is to enlarge her activity.

loans.use: to buy handbags and cloth, as well as cosmetics.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy another motorcycle for transport

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es:
Elizabeth, vive con su esposo, dos hijos, ella se dedica a prestar servicios en un molino, inicio por su esposo, trabaja con un sobrino, su horario de trabajo es de 5:00am a 5:00pm, tiene mucha experiencia en el manejo de los molinos.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de piezas nuevas para reparar el molino, y que este funcione bien, ya que últimamente está presentando problemas al momento de prestar los servicios.
Ella espera que este préstamo le ayude a mejorar el molino, además desea ser buen cliente, iniciando con este primer crédito y siendo responsable en sus pagos.
texts.en:
Elizabeth lives with her husband and two children. She works renting out the services of her mill, which was started by her husband. She works with her nephew. Her hours of work are 5:00am-5:00pm. She has a lot of experience operating the mills.
She is requesting a loan to buy new parts to repair the mill to make sure that it works well because it has recently being having problems when it's being used. 
She hopes that the loan will help her to improve the mill and she wants to be a good borrower starting with this first loan and being responsible about her repayments.

loans.use: to buy new parts to repair the mill.

loans.name: Filwende Group

texts.fr:
Mme SUZANE est la représentante du groupe FILWENDE. Elle est  mariée  et mère de 02enfants. Le plus âgé  a 04ans et  le moins âgé a 04ans ( ce sont des jumeaux). Tous vont  à l’école. Elle a 02 personnes  en charge.

Elle vend des paniers  depuis 01ans. Elle s’approvisionne  à Banfora une ville du BURKINA. Ses clients sont  les femmes et hommes (au marché et le voisinage).

Elle veut  s’acheter 20 gros paniers, 70 moyens et 250 petits paniers.

 Mme utilise ses bénéfices pour mieux satisfaire sa demande. Elle ambitionne  acheter  une parcelle et assurer l’éducation et le bien être de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Madame Suzane is the representative of the Filwende group. She is married with two sons; they are both four years old (they are twins) and both go to school. She is responsible for two people.
She has sold baskets for one year. She stocks up in Banfora, a town in Burkina Faso. Her customers are men and women (from her neighbourhood and customers at the market).
She would like to buy 20 large baskets, 70 medium baskets and 250 small baskets.
Suzane uses her earnings to better serve her customers' demand. Her goal is to buy a plot of land and ensure her children's education and well-being.

loans.use: to buy 20 large baskets, 70 medium baskets, and 250 small baskets.

loans.name: Claudette

texts.en: Claudette is 39 years old and has 2 children ages 10 and 12. Both children are currently in school. She sells foodstuffs in a shop she has run for 12 years. Claudette would like a loan to buy peanuts, fish, and onions to sell in her shop. She will use any profits to pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: To buy peanuts, fish and onions.

loans.name: Marie

texts.en:
Marie is 48 years old, married, and has four children, aged 9 months to 19 years. Her husband is a farmer. She sells foodstuffs in a shop she has run for five years. 

Marie is requesting a loan, which she will use to buy beans and sorghum to sell in her shop. She plans to use any profits to build a house. She hopes to run a big and prosperous store in the future.

loans.use: to purchase beans and sorghum to sell.

loans.name: Evelin Cecilia

texts.es:
Evelin, vive con sus padres y hermanos, es soltero, administra una tienda y crianza de cerdos, ella inicio con su madre, dedicándose siempre al negocio de porqueriza, lo tienen en la casa donde viven, no hay un horario especifico para atender las actividades que demanda.
Ella quiere comprar mercadería para la tienda, por eso solicita un préstamo e invertirlo en arroz, azúcar, frijoles, aceite, boquitas, dulces, esto le ayudara para surtir el negocio y para tener más variedad para los clientes.
Su aspiración es crecer en el negocio y que su familia cuente con su apoyo y vivan en buenas condiciones.
texts.en:
Evelin lives with her parents and brothers and is single. She runs a store and raises pigs. She began these businesses with her mother and she has always worked at the pork business. They run the business from the house where they live and there isn't a specific timetable by which they carry out the needed work.
She wants to buy supplies for the store, and so she is requesting a loan to buy rice, sugar, beans, oil, snacks, and snacks. This will help her to stock the business and offer a greater variety to the customers.
Her hope is to grow the business so that her family can count on it's support and live comfortably.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, beans, oil, snacks, and candy.

loans.name: Mirian Del Carmen

texts.es:
la sra. Mirian del Camen esta casada y es madre de 2 hijos, los tiene estudiando en el centro escolar público de su localidad, Mirian se dedica al comercio, cuenta con una pulpería, tiene mas de 2 años de tenerla, ahi   vende muchos productos relacionados con la canasta basica familiar,  su negocio esta ubicado en su casa de habitacion, el cual queda frente a un campo de fútbol, esto hace que muchas personas visiten su negocio.
Mirian administra su negocio y lo atiende personalmente. 
gracias a su negocio ha logrado salir adelante con sus hijos.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de abarroteria, granos basicos y otros alimentos, desea tener mas surtido su negocio para la epoca de navidad.
texts.en:
Mirian is married and is the mother of 2 children who are studying at the central public school in their town. Mirian is a business woman and runs a grocery store. She has been doing this for more than 2 years. She sells many products that families need every day. Her business is located in her home, which is opposite the soccer pitch, and this means that many people visit her store. 
Mirian runs the store and staffs it herself.
Thanks to her business she has been able to support her children to move forward in life.
The loan will be used to buy groceries, basic grains, and other food. She wants to have more stick for the Christmas period.

loans.use: to buy soap, butter, oil, sodas, bread, cookies, beans, rice, sugar, doughnuts, powdered milk, cereal, oats, toothpaste, toilet paper, sausages, dairy products, and chicken.

loans.name: Adilia Del Carmen

texts.es:
Adilia, tiene una pupuseria, vive con su familia, su madre, su esposo y un hijo, la pupuseria la inicio con el apoyo de su madre, lo tiene en su casa, todas las tardes se instala con la venta.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de maíz, quesillo, chicharrón, leña, condimentos, esto le ayudara para tener disponibilidad de productos para el negocio, y poder brindar siempre la atención  a los clientes.
Su aspiración es crecer en el negocio, ampliándose y generando mayores ganancias.
texts.en:
Adilia has a pupusa [Salvadoran grilled, stuffed corncakes] shop.  She lives with her family, her mother, her husband and a son.  She started the pupusa shop with help from her mother; it’s home-based and she sells every evening.

She is asking for a loan to buy corn, cheese, fried pork skin, firewood and condiments that will help her have ingredients for the business on hand to always provide good customer service.  Her goals are to make the business grow, expanding and generating higher profits.

loans.use: to buy corn, cheese, firewood, fried pork skin and condiments.

loans.name: Milton Gustavo

texts.es:
el joven Milton Gustavo tiene 23 años de edad, esta soltero y su principal fuente de ingresos es la venta de verduras, actividad que realiza desde hace dos años, manifiesta que durante ese tiempo le ha ido muy bien, sus ventas las realiza al por mayor a diferentes negocios del municipio de Las Trojes, Milton viaja a la ciudad de Tegucigalpa para comprar verduras dos veces por semana (martes y viernes) y despues las vende en las Trojes en su carro pickup.
utilizara el credito para comprar mas verduras, ya que las exigencias de sus clientes son mayores y no cubre con todos los pedidos que le hacen.
texts.en:
Young Milton Gustavo is 23 years old and single.  His main source of income is selling vegetables, a job he has been doing for two years.  He says that during this time it has gone very well for him.  He makes his sales wholesale to different businesses in the town of Las Trojes.  Milton travels to the city of Tegucigalpa to buy vegetables twice a week (Tuesdays and Fridays) and later sells them in Las Trojes in his pickup truck.

He will use the loan to buy more vegetables because his customer demand is great and he cannot meet all the orders they have made.

loans.use: to buy potatoes, tomatoes, onions, chilis, and yucca.

loans.name: Jose Rudy

texts.es:
José, Administra un taller de reparación de equipo electrónico, él vive con su esposa y dos hijos, su familia depende de él, este negocio lo aprendió por iniciativa propia, trabajando en su casa y a domicilio, no tiene un horario fijo. Él está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de herramientas para trabajar, ya que tiene que comprarlas porque se le están dañando las que tiene por la antigüedad.
Este préstamo le ayudara para mejorar su negocio y satisfacer las necesidades de la familia, ya que quiere comprar en un futuro su propia casa.
texts.en:
José runs an electronic equipment repair shop.  He lives with his wife and two children.  His family depends on him.  He learned this work on his own initiative, working in his house at home.  He does not have a fixed schedule.

He is requesting a loan to buy tools for work, since he has to buy them because the ones he has are breaking because they are old.

This loan will help him improve his business and satisfy the needs of his family, because in the future he wants to buy his own home.

loans.use: to buy tools for work.

loans.name: Liberathe

texts.en:
Liberathe is 35 years old and has five children, aged 8 to 18, all of whom attend school. She sells foodstuffs in a shop she has run for 14 years. 

Liberathe is requesting a loan, which she will use to buy peanuts, fish, onions, and cooking oil to sell in her shop. Liberathe will use any profits to renovate her house. She hopes to become a distributor of foodstuffs in the future.

loans.use: to purchase peanuts, fish, onions, and cooking oil to sell.

loans.name: Marcela Alexandra

texts.es:
Marcela de 44 años, empezó con esta actividad cuando su esposo la abandono y tuvo que sacar adelante a su familia, con la ayuda de Dios ha podido sobresalir y hasta ahora le ha ido muy bien.

Ella trabaja solo y viaja a Perú a ver su mercadería.

Está separada y tiene 3 hijos, 2 son mayores de edad y la ultima hija tiene 10 años que estudia en escuela fiscal.

Su meta a alcanzar es poder agrandar su negocio y poder mejorar su vivienda.
texts.en: Marcela, 44, started this activity when her husband abandoned her and she had to support her family.  With God’s help she’s managed to get ahead and to date has done very well.  She works alone and travels to Perú to get her merchandise.  She’s separated and has three children; two are adults and her youngest daughter is 10 years old and attends public school.  Her goal is to be able to increase her business and to do some home improvements.

loans.use: to buy blouses and pants.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy tools: metric measuring tapes, lead, saw and bars.

loans.name: Sidy  Ndiaye

texts.fr: L'emprunteur est un homme marié , père de trois enfants qui vont tous à l'école.Il exerce le métier de chauffeur de car de transport de touristes qu'ils conduit dans les différentes sites culturels du pays.En outre, il dispose d'un véhicule de transport urbain.Les revenus que génère ce taxi lui permettent d'améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille.Il parvient ainsi , chaque mois à  payer les frais scolaires de ses trois enfants, les factures d'eau, d'électricité ainsi que ses charges locatives.Malheureusement, depuis deux mois, le moteur du taxi est tombé en panne , le plongeant ainsi dans des difficultés pour une prise en charge correcte des besoins de sa famille. Afin de réparer le véhicule, il sollicite un prêt de 400000f pour acheter un autre moteur.Son ambition est de relancer et d'élargir ses activités.
texts.en:
The borrower is a married man, the father of three children who all attend school. His job is driving a bus transporting tourists whom he conveys to various cultural sites in the country. Moreover, he has an urban transport vehicle. The income from this taxi allows him to improve living conditions for his family. In this way, he manages every month to pay the school fees for his three children, the bills for water and electricity and his rent. 

Unfortunately, for two months now, the taxi's motor has been out of commission, causing him difficulty in supporting his family correctly. In order to repair that vehicle, he is asking for a loan of 400,000 francs to buy another motor. His ambition is to get his businesses going again and expand them.

loans.use: to buy another motor.

loans.name: Dios Verdadero 5 & 6 Group

texts.en:
This group is located in the area surrounding San Pedro de Macoris. They all live in a rural community, surrounded by sugarcane fields. Carmen is the coordinator of this group, called Dios Verdadero 5 & 6 (True God). She is mother of two children and they live together in a modest home with her long term partner, who is also her childrens' father.

Carmen has had her business for about two years. She started selling gums, snack and candies, while she was saving to start a little "colmado" (small grocery store). She plans to use this loan to invest in her business and buy different products such as rice, beans, sugar, canned food, and other goods. With her business profits she is planning to reinvest in her business and to buy some appliances for her house.

Carmen is excited to be taking her second loan with Esperanza. After having successfully repaid her previous loan, she has been able to grow her business. For her future, she would like to be a successful entrepreuner. She thanks all of you for your support! 

(This group has two pictures because we got the pictures from one of their field meetings and by mistake the loan officer took two shots.)

loans.use: to buy rice, beans and sugar.

loans.name: Karla Patricia

texts.es:
Karla, vive con su esposo y sus dos hijos de 8 y 12 años de edad, ella inicio un negocio de venta de pupusas con la ayuda del esposo, este negocio es propio y tiene 6 años de tenerlo.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de chicharrón, aceite, gas, maíz, para tener en el inventario, ya que así se ahorra el gasto de varios meses, para trabajar libremente, la idea de Karla es mejorar el negocio, abastecerse de productos para la producción de pupusas.
La aspiración de ella es salir adelante, con ayuda de los financiamientos para apoyar a su familia.
texts.en:
Karla lives with her husband and two children who are 8 and 12 years of age.  She started her business selling pupusas [Salvadoran grilled, stuffed corncakes] with help from her husband.  The business is hers and she’s had it for six years.

She is asking for a loan at present to buy fried pork skin, oil, gas and corn to have in stock because this way she saves on costs for several months and can work freely.  Karla’s idea is to improve the business stocking up on the ingredients to make pupusas.  Her hope is to get ahead with help from the loans to support her family.

loans.use: to buy fried pork skin, oil, gas and corn.

loans.name: Maricela Del Carmen

texts.es:
Maricela, es comerciante de ropa, actualmente vive con su suegra, ella inicio su negocio hace varios años, solamente vende dos días a la semana, lo aprendió de familia, y es su única fuente de ingreso.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de ropa: blusas, faldas, ropa interior,  entre otras prendas que son demandadas por los clientes, su aspiración es crecer en el negocio, expandirse para obtener mayores ganancias. La aspiración de Maricela es crecer a través de prestamos y velar por las necesidades del hogar.
texts.en:
Maricela es a clothes merchant.  She currently lives with her mother-in-law.  She started her business several years ago.  She only sells two days a week.  She learned from her family and it’s her only source of income.

She is asking for a loan to buy clothes: blouses, skirts and underwear, among other articles of clothing that are asked for by her customers.  Her goal is to grow in business expanding to earn higher profits.  Maricela hopes to grow through the loans and to watch over her household’s needs.

loans.use: to buy clothes: blouses, skirts and underwear.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy chargers, cases, spare parts and new mobile phones.

loans.name: Clementine

texts.en: Clementine is 41 years old and has four children aged 10 to 19. All four children are in school. She sells meat in a shop she has run for 17 years. She would like a loan to buy more cows to sell in her shop. Any profits will be used to pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: To buy meat to sell in her butcher shop.

loans.name: Florence

texts.en:
Florence lives in Mariakani, Kenya. She is single and has two children, both of whom are in school. She has operated a retail shop for the last six years. Florence employs one other person in her business.

She is applying for a loan of KES 80,000 to purchase sugar, salt, and biscuits etc. She joined the group after an invitation from her friends. Her main challenge has been the lack of capital to buy more stock, a problem that has now been solved by joining Milango. Her aspirations include the opening of a wholesale business in the future.

The extra income obtained from this business will help her educate her children and also improve their standard of living.

loans.use: To purchase sugar, salt and biscuits for sale.

loans.name: Nonvigbe Vinanwamon Group

texts.fr: Le groupe NONVIGBE VINANWAMON est composé de trois personnes qui résident dans le même quartier. La représentante du groupe, du nom de Julienne est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Julienne est âgée de 56 ans et vit au Bénin. Julienne n’a pas fréquenté l’école. Julienne est mariée à un transporteur du nom de Georges. Le couple a cinq enfants tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Julienne vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants. Le couple assure ensemble les diverses charges de la maison. Afin d'assurer les diverses charges de la famille, Julienne prépare de la nourriture (riz et pâte de maïs) qu'elle vend dans un quartier du Bénin. Julienne s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu, Julienne sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe NONVIGBE VINANWAMON, un crédit auprès de ALIDé.
texts.en:
The group called NONVIGBE VINANWAMON is composed of three persons who live in the same district. The representative of the group, Julienne, is the one with her hand raised in the photo. 

Julienne is 56 and lives in Bénin. She did not attend school. She is married to a long-distance driver named Georges. The couple have five children, all enrolled in school and all living under their roof. 

Julienne lives together with her husband and children. The couple share in supporting their family. In order to cover the various expenses of the household, Julienne  prepares and sells food (rice and maize porridge.) She sells this food in a neighborhood in Benin. She buys her supplies in Benin. Wishing to satisfy the needs of her clientele and grow her turnover and her income, Julienne is requesting, together with the other members of the NONVIGBE VINANWAMON group, a loan from ALIDé.

loans.use: to buy sacks of rice and maize.

loans.name: Fifame 1 Group

texts.fr: Le groupe FIFAME 1 est composé de quatre personnes qui résident dans le même quartier. C'est la troisième fois que ce groupe sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de son activité. La représentante du groupe, du nom de Sènalonhan Victorine est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Sènalonhan Victorine est âgée de 34 ans et vit au Bénin. Sènalonhan Victorine a arrêté l’école au niveau primaire. Sènalonhan Victorine est mariée à un financier du nom de André. Le couple a deux enfants tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Sènalonhan Victorine vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants. Le couple assure ensemble les diverses charges de la maison. Afin d'assurer les diverses charges de la famille, Sènalonhan Victorine vend depuis sept ans, des conserves, des savons et des cartes de recharges dans son quartier. Sènalonhan Victorine s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu, Sènalonhan Victorine sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe FIFAME 1, un troisième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les deux premiers prêts ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
The group FIFAME 1 consists of four members who live in the same neighborhood. This is the group’s third time seeking financial support from ALIDé to bolster their activities. 

The representative of the group is Sènalonhan Victorine, seen with a hand raised in the photo. Sènalonhan Victorine is 34 years old and lives in Benin. She abandoned her studies in primary school. She is married to a financier named André, and they have two dependent children who both go to school. Sènalonhan Victorine lives with her husband and their children, and the couple handle together the various household responsibilities. 

In order to help provide for the family, Sènalonhan Victorine has been selling canned goods, soaps, and mobile phone recharge cards around her neighborhood for the past seven years. She buys her stock at a market in Benin. 

Eager to achieve customer satisfaction and to increase her sales and revenue, Sènalonhan Victorine is seeking a third loan from ALIDé together with the other members of her group. Both previous loans were correctly repaid.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, soaps, and mobile phone recharge cards for resale.

loans.name: Ajorgnon Group

texts.fr: Le groupe AJORGNON est composé de trois personnes qui résident dans le même quartier. C'est la troisième fois que ce groupe sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de son activité. La représentante  du groupe, du nom de Gilberte est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Gilberte est âgée de 35 ans et vit au Bénin. Gilberte a arrêté l’école au niveau primaire. Gilberte est mariée à un agent de banque du nom de Jules. Le couple a trois enfants tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Gilberte vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants. Afin d'assurer les diverses charges de la famille, Gilberte vend depuis une dizaine d’années, des tissus et des chaussures par le système de distribution. Gilberte s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin et au Togo. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu, Gilberte sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe AJORGNON, un troisième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les crédits précédents ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
The group AJORGNON consists of three members who live in the same neighborhood. This is the group’s third time seeking financial support from ALIDé to bolster their activities. The representative of the group is Gilberte, seen with her hand raised in the photo. Gilberte is 35 years old and lives in Benin. She ended her studies in primary school. Gilberte is married to a bank clerk named Jules and they have three dependent children who all attend school. Gilberte lives with her husband and their children, and the couple handle together the various household responsibilities. 

In order to help provide for her family, Gilberte has been selling fabrics and shoes through the distribution system for the past ten years. She buys her stock at a market in Benin, and also in Togo. 

Eager to achieve customer satisfaction and to increase her sales and revenue, Gilberte is seeking a third loan from ALIDé together with the other group members. All previous loans were correctly repaid.

loans.use: to buy bales of fabrics and shoes for resale.

loans.name: Allodalome Group

texts.fr: Le groupement ALLODALOME est composé de vingt deux personnes qui habitent la même région. La représentante  de ce groupement, du nom de Pascaline est celle ayant une main levée sur la photo. Dans le but de rehausser le niveau de leur activité afin de mieux faire face à la demande de leur clientèle, ce groupement sollicite l'appui financier de ALIDé. Pascaline est âgée de 49 ans et vit au Bénin. Pascaline est mariée à un cultivateur du nom de Joseph. Le couple a quatre enfants, dont certains scolarisés et tous à leur charge. En plus de leurs enfants, le couple a deux autres enfants en charge. Pascaline et son mari vivent ensemble avec leurs enfants. Pour contribuer aux besoins de sa famille, Pascaline mène comme activité depuis une trentaine d’année, la vente de poissons fumés et des condiments dans sa région. Dans le but de renforcer leur activité et mieux satisfaire à la demande de leur clientèle, Pascaline et les autres membres du groupement ALLODALOME sollicite un premier crédit auprès de ALIDé.
texts.en: The ALLODALOME group is made up of twenty-two people who all live in the same area.  Pascaline, the woman raising her hand on the photo, is the facilitator of the group.  In order to boost their business and better meet their customers' demand, the group is requesting financial assistance from Alidé.  Pascaline is 49 years-old and lives in Bénin.  She is married to a farmer named Joseph.  They have four children whom they all financially support.   Some of their children go to school.  Besides their own children, Pascaline and Joseph also financially support two other children.  Pascaline and her husband live together with their children.  In order to help provide for her family, Pascaline has been selling smoked fish and various condiments, locally, for about thirty years.  Pascaline and the other members of the ALLODALOME group have requested their first loan from Alidé in order to strengthen their business and to better satisfy their customers.

loans.use: To buy fresh fish and various condiments.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for the transportation of his produce from the farm to the market.

loans.name: Finagnon Group

texts.fr: Le groupement FINAGNON est composé de dix neuf personnes qui habitent la même région. C'est la première fois que ce groupement sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de son activité. La représentante du groupe, du nom de Mivèmon est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Mivèmon est âgée de 36 ans et vit au Bénin. Mivèmon n’a pas fréquenté l’école. Mivèmon est mariée à un instituteur du nom de Victor. Le couple a sept enfants dont certains scolarisés et cinq restent à leur charge. Mivèmon vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants. Le couple assure ensemble les diverses charges de la maison. Pour contribuer aux diverses charges de la famille, Mivèmon vend depuis une trentaine d’année, de la farine de manioc, du maïs et de l’haricot dans sa région. De façon secondaire, Mivèmon  fait la restauration. Mivèmon s’approvisionne dans sa région. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu, Mivèmon sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupement FINAGNON, un premier crédit auprès de ALIDé.
texts.en:
The Dossa group consists of nineteen people who live in the same region. This is the first time the group is seeking financial support from ALIDé, to raise the level of its business activities.

The representative of the group, named Mivèmon, is raising her hand in the picture. She is 36 years old and lives in Benin.

Mivèmon has not attended school. She is married to a schoolteacher named Victor. The couple have seven children, of whom some attend school. Five of the children are still under their care. Mivèmon lives together with her ​​husband and children, and the couple share responsibility in dealing with the various household expenditures.

To contribute towards family expenses over the past 30 years, Mivèmon has been selling cassava flour, maize and beans throughout the region. Additionally, she also sells food preparations. Mivèmon gets her supplies in the region.

Seeking to satisfy her customers and increase her turnover and income, Mivèmon, together with the other members of the Dossa group, is requesting a first credit loan from ALIDé.

loans.use: Buy bags of maize and beans.

loans.name: Fifonsi Group

texts.fr: Le groupement FIFONSI est composé de dix-sept personnes qui habitent le même quartier et mènent toutes des activités génératrices de revenus. C'est la première fois que ce groupement sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de son activité. La représentante  du groupement, du nom de Sidonie est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Sidonie est âgée de 31 ans et vit au Bénin. Sidonie n’a pas fréquenté l’école. Sidonie est mariée à un certain Joachim. Le couple a trois enfants dont certains scolarisés et tous à leur charge. Sidonie vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants. Le couple assure ensemble les diverses charges de la maison. Afin de subvenir aux diverses charges de la famille, Sidonie exerce depuis une quinzaine d’années, la vente de poulets dans sa région. De façon secondaire, Sidonie vend de l’huile de palme. Sidonie s’approvisionne dans sa région. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu, Sidonie sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupement FIFONSI, un premier crédit auprès de ALIDé.
texts.en:
The Fifonsi group consists of seventeen people living in the same neighborhood. All lead income-generating activities, and for the first time the group is seeking financial support from ALIDé, to raise the level of its business activities.

The representative of the group, named Sidonie, is raising her hand in the picture. Sidonie is 31 years old and lives in Benin.

Sidonie has not attended school. She is married to Joachim. The couple has three children; some attend school and all are their dependents. Sidonie lives together with her ​​husband and children, and the couple shares responsibility for all household expenses.

To deal with various family expenses over the past fifteen years, Sidonie has been selling chickens throughout the region. She also sells palm oil, and gets her supplies in the region.

Sidonie is seeking to satisfy her customers and increase her turnover and income. Together with the other members of the Fifonsi group, she is now requesting a first credit loan from ALIDé.

loans.use: Buy cans of vegetable oil and chickens

loans.name: Sourou Group

texts.fr: Le groupe SOUROU est composé de trois personnes qui sont résident dans le même quartier. La représentante du groupe, du nom de Emma Kokoè est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Emma Kokoè est âgée de 53 ans et vit au Bénin. Emma Kokoè a arrêté l’école au niveau secondaire. Emma Kokoè est mariée à un certain Victor. Le couple a trois enfants tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Emma Kokoè vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants. Le couple assure ensemble les différentes charges de la maison. Afin de contribuer aux diverses besoins familiales, Emma Kokoè mène comme activité depuis douze ans, la vente de tissus, de conserves et des cartes de recharges téléphoniques dans son quartier du Bénin. Emma Kokoè s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu, Emma Kokoè sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe SOUROU, un crédit auprès de ALIDé.
texts.en:
The SOUROU group consists of three members who live in the same neighborhood. The representative of the group is Emma Kokoè, seen with her hand raised in the photo. Emma Kokoè is 53 years old and lives in Benin. She attended high school.  She is married to a man named Victor. The couple have three dependent children who all attend school. Emma Kokoè lives with her husband and their children, and the couple handle together the various household responsibilities. 

In order to help support the family, Emma Kokoè has been selling fabrics, canned goods, and mobile phone recharge cards around her neighborhood for the past twelve years. She buys her stock at a market in Benin. 

Eager to achieve customer satisfaction and to increase her sales and revenue, Emma Kokoè is seeking a loan from ALIDé together with the other members of the Sourou group.

loans.use: to buy fabrics, canned goods, and mobile phone recharge cards for resale.

loans.name: Carlos Venancio

texts.es: Carlos, está sembrando nuevamente la hortalizas, por eso está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de semilla, abono y pago de alquiler de tierras, ya que en este mes inicia todos los preparativos, con  el préstamo anterior, logro comprar también insumos y por las lluvias se le daño una parte de la cosecha pero logro rescatar buena parte.
texts.en: Carlos is sowing vegetables again, therefore he is requesting a loan for the purchase of seed and fertilizer and to pay the rent on his lands, since this is the month when he begins all the preparations.  With the previous loan, he managed to also buy supplies and, although the rains damaged a part of the crop, he managed to rescue a good part.

loans.use: to buy seed and fertilizer and to pay the rent on his lands.

loans.name: Juana Evangelista

texts.es:
Juana, nuevamente solicita un préstamo, para la compra de productos de primera necesidad, ya que su negocio necesita ser reforzado, por eso se decide a solicitar e invertir en maíz, aceite,  leña y otros que le son necesarios la elaboracion de sus productos.
Ella ha tenido una buena experiencia con el negocio y ha logrado aumentar su nivel de venta.
texts.en: Juana once again requests a loan for the purchase of basic supplies, since her business needs to be reinforced. For this reason she has decided to invest in corn, oil, firewood and other supplies that are necessary for making her products.  She has had a good experience with the business and has managed to grow her sales.

loans.use: to buy corn, oil and firewood.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy lubricants, oils, break fluid, spark plug cablesCompra lubricantes, aceites, solución de frenos, cables de bujillas.

loans.name: Maribel De Los Angeles

texts.es: Maribel, solicita nuevamente un préstamo, ya que iniciara junto a su esposo la nueva siembra, comprara abono, herbicidas y semillas, este le servirá para mantener todo lo necesario y poder contar a buen tiempo con los materiales. Ella espera obtener resultados satisfactorios, ya que en el invierno se le perdió buena parte de la cosecha.
texts.en:
Maribel is asking for another loan because she and her husband have begun planting, and she will buy fertilizer, herbicides and seeds. 

This will help her manage all that she needs in order to have the supplies in good time. 

She is hoping for satisfactory results because in the winter they lost much of the harvest.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, herbicides and seeds.

loans.name: Fidel Antonio

texts.es:
Fidel, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo para invertirlo en su nuevo cultivo, comprando insumos como abono, herbicidas y de esta manera nuevamente cuidar del cultivo para que sea provechoso.
El tiene buenas experiencias con los préstamos anteriores, ya que ha realizado buenas inversiones y ha podido mejorar su condición familiar.
texts.en:
Fidel is asking for another loan to invest in his new crop, buying supplies such as fertilizer and herbicides in order to once again care for his crops in order for them to be profitable.

He has good experience in his previous loans, and has made wise investments and has been able to improve the quality of life for his family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and herbicides

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy rice, beans, oil and eggs

loans.name: Martalina

texts.es:
Martalina, necesita invertir nuevamente en el negocio, por eso se decide a comprar 4 cerdos, para engordarlos, aumentando su granja y la posibilidad de generar mejores ventas.
Ella a través de los prestamos ha logrado cambiar la condición económica y que su granja ahora en mayor y le da más mantenimiento.
texts.en:
Martalina needs to invest in her business again, so she decided to buy four pigs to fatten, expanding her farming business and increasing the possibility of generating more sales.

Through the loans she has succeeded in changing her economic condition and enlarging her farm and giving it more maintenance.

loans.use: to buy four pigs.

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Jorge

texts.es:
Jorge, se ha decidido por un nuevo préstamo, ya que quiere comprar madera de cedro, laurel y aceituno, además pega, y dar mantenimiento a su equipo de trabajo, dándole mayor seguridad en la dedicación de su oficio para elaborar los muebles. 
Él ha logrado mejorar y tener lo necesario en el trabajo, todo por la ayuda de los préstamos, su condición si ha cambiado y satisfecho los trabajos de los clientes.
texts.en:
Jorge has decided to apply for a new loan, since he would like to buy cedar, laurel and olive wood, as well as some glue, and also perform maintenance on his work equipment, giving him better security as he carries out his profession of making furniture. 

He has been able to improve his situation and have what he needs in his work, all thanks to the help of the loans. His condition has changed for the better and he is able to satisfy his customers' requests.

loans.use: to buy cedar, laurel and olive wood.

loans.name: Benita De Los Angeles

texts.es:
Benita, se ha decidido por un nuevo préstamo el cual lo invertirá en su negocio, ya que quiere comprar más mercadería para la época de diciembre como: plátanos, guineos, yuca, zanahorias por medio de los préstamos a podido aumentar en sus ventas.
Ella está contento por los préstamos anteriores porque le han ayudado a  fortalecer su negocio y ha estado al día con sus cuotas y su familia está más estable económicamente, aunque en su ultimos pagos no fueron puntuales.
texts.en:
Benita has made up her mind to apply for a new loan, which she will invest in her business, since she wants to buy more merchandise for the December season. She will buy such items as bananas, small sweet bananas, yucca, and carrots. She has been able to increase her sales through the loans.

She is happy with her past loans because they have helped her strengthen her business and she has been up-to-date with her bills. Her family is more stable economically, even though her last payments were not on time.

loans.use: to buy bananas, little sweet bananas, yucca, and oil.

loans.name: Melvin Everardo

texts.es:
Melvin Everardo de 39 años de edad, reside en el municipio de Gualaco, ubicado en el departamento de Olancho. Desde hace 22 años que se dedica a la carpintería y aprendió del oficio gracias a su padre.  
El negocio de la carpintería en ciertas temporadas resulta ser muy rentable para Melvin ya que cuenta con buenos clientes y en esta temporada navideña le están solicitando algunos pedidos. Él solicita este préstamo para comprar madera y así contar con más materia prima para elaborar los muebles que ya tiene encargados por sus clientes. El mayor deseo de Melvin es el de aumentar sus ganancias y de esta forma mejorar la economía de su hogar y mejorar la instalación física de su taller de carpintería.
texts.en:
Melvin Everardo is 39 years old. He lives in the town of Gualaco, located in the department of Olancho. He has been working as a carpenter for 22 years and learned the trade from his father.

The business of carpentry in certain seasons is very profitable for Melvin and since he has good customers in this Christmas season they are placing orders.

He is asking for a loan in order to buy wood and thus to have more raw material for his business. Melvin’s greatest desire is to increase his earnings and thus improve the family savings and to improve the premises of his woodworking shop.

loans.use: to buy wood.

loans.name: Jose Valentin

texts.es: José, por necesidad de invertir está solicitando un préstamo por el buen servicio y atención que recibe, actualmente comprara una vaca, un ternero y harina para el ganado, esto le ayudara para mejorar su condición ganadera, además los anteriores le ayudaron en los cultivos agrícolas, su condición de vida ha mejorado y han sacado la cosecha para la alimentación de la familia.
texts.en: Due to the need for investment, José is requesting a loan, in light of the good service and help he receives. With this loan, he will buy a cow, a calf and feed for his livestock. This will help him improve the condition of his livestock. The previous loans helped him with his farm crops, so that his quality of life has improved, and he has harvested his crops to feed his family.

loans.use: to buy a cow, a calf and feed for his livestock.

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Luis

texts.es: Luis, por el buen servicio y porque necesita invertir dinero, comprando dos bueyes y los insumos agrícolas como abono y herbicidas, esto le ayudara para aumentar su ganado y para iniciar el cultivo de maíz. Los préstamos anteriores le ayudaron para mejorar los resultados en las cosechas, sus condiciones han cambiado en la familia.
texts.en:
Luis needs to invest money buying 2 oxen and agriculture supplies such as fertilizer and herbicides to care for his crops. 

This will help him to increase his livestock and to begin planting corn. 

The previous loans helped him improve the results he had with his harvest, and the quality of life of his family has changed.

loans.use: to buy two oxen, fertilizer and herbicides

loans.name: Ana Maribel

texts.es:
Ana, se ha decidido por un nuevo préstamo para invertirlo en su negocio, para comprar mercadería ya que viene la época de diciembre y es necesario tener varios productos para vende y comprar bebidas como: jugos, gaseosas y golosinas para ofrecerles a sus clientes.
Ella se siente bien por los prestamos anteriores le ayudaron mucho a mejorar su inventario y los ingresos fueron mejores y  dar mejor estabilidad a su familia.
texts.en:
Ana has decided to take out a new loan to invest in her business. She will buy merchandise, because the December season is coming and she needs to have a range of products to sell. She will buy beverages such as juice and soft drinks as well as candies to offer to her customers. 

She feels good about the previous loans, which helped her greatly to improve her inventory. Her income has been improved, and she has been able to provide better stability for her family.

loans.use: to buy juice, soft drinks and candies.

loans.name: Julio Antonio

texts.es:
Julio, de nuevo solicita otro préstamo, con el propósito de utilizarlo en la agricultura, ya que todos los años siembra granos básicos y necesita comprar los insumos como el abono y los herbicidas, para trabajar la tierra, los prestamos le han ayudado a obtener mejores cosechas y darles lo necesario a su familia.
El se siente muy contento de seguir trabajando con la institución y lo mejor que ha tenido mejor producción que los años anteriores y su familia está más estable.
texts.en:
Julio is asking for another loan for the purpose of using it in agriculture.

Every year he plants the basic grains and he needs to buy supplies such as fertilizer and herbicides, in order to work the land. 

The loans have helped him to have better crops and meet the needs of his family.

He feels very happy to continue working with the institution and he has had a better production than in years past and his family is more stable.

loans.use: to buy fertlizer and herbicides

loans.name: Hector

texts.en:
Hector came to the United States in 2003 with the dream of starting his own company. Back in his native Ecuador, he was in the fishing industry for over 20 years and so he wanted to start a business in his area of expertise. With that, he decided to import seafood from Ecuador to South Florida. It took him almost 4 years to plan the business, from creating distribution partnerships to developing operations. He started the business a year and a half ago and it has been growing since then. Hector’s son lives in Ecuador and manages logistics, including purchasing in bulk and shipping for sale and distribution in the United States. Hector is very proud to say he is a business owner and wants to expand to new markets. He hopes to someday distribute nationally and leave behind a legacy for his family.

This is Hector’s second loan with Accion USA. He will use it to purchase shrimp and fish in bulk and have it shipped to the United States. Now that the slow season has been over for a few months, this loan will help Hector stock up the inventory he needs to jump-start expansion of his clientele base.

loans.use: To purchase and import seafood from Ecuador.

loans.name: Judith Isilma

texts.es:
Judith, solicita un nuevo préstamo para la compra de una mesa amasadora, para moldear el pan, ya que necesita de esta herramienta para mejorar su producción, aumentado la posibilidad de mejorar la venta.
Estos préstamos le ayudan para que su negocio sea cada vez mejor.
texts.en:
Judith is asking for a new loan in order to buy a table kneading machine in order to make bread because she needs the machine in order to increase her production, improving her sales. 

The loans help her to make her business to be even better.

loans.use: to buy a kneading machine in order to make bread

loans.name: Suyapa Yolibeth

texts.es:
Suyapa Yolibeth tiene 39 años de edad, es casada y tiene 4 hijos, y reside en la Comunidad de Gualaco, en el departamento de Olancho. Desde hace 11 años trabaja vendiendo ropa y otros productos de uso personal. Inició en una parte de su casa y ahora su tienda tiene dos plantas y cuenta con una empleada para que le ayude a atender a los clientes. Suyapa también es maestra de educación primaria y le encanta enseñarles cosas nuevas y educativas a sus alumnos.
El préstamo que solicita Suyapa lo necesita para comprar mercadería nueva como ser vestidos, zapatos, jeans, blusas, ropa interior, sandalias, entre otros productos. 
Una de las metas de Suyapa es enseñarles a sus hijos a trabajar de forma honesta, ya que es la mejor herencia que puede dejarles. La vida económica de Suyapa ha cambiado grandemente desde que recibe el apoyo de los préstamos de FAMA.
texts.en:
Suyapa Yolibeth, 39, is married and has four children. She resides in the community of Gualaco, in Olancho department. She has been selling clothing and other personal use products for 11 years. She started her business in a section of her house and now her store has two floors and she has an employee to help her wait on customers. Supaya is also a primary school teacher and she loves teaching new, educational things to her students.

Supaya needs the loan she is requesting to purchase new merchandise, such as dresses, shoes, jeans, blouses, underwear and sandals among other items. One of her goals is to teach her children to do honest work, since that is the best inheritance she can pass on to them. Supaya’s economic life has changed greatly since she received support from the loans provided her by FAMA.

loans.use: to buy clothing, shoes and sandals.

loans.name: Jose Rigoberto

texts.es:
José, quiere incrementar el negocio, comprando mercadería para ofrecer mayor cantidad y variedad de estilos a los clientes, comprara sandalias, ropa nueva, artesanía, aprovechando la temporada que se avecina para mantener de todos los posibles demandantes de productos.
Debido a su buen manejo con el anterior préstamo, sus ganancias han sido mejores y logro pagar a tiempo el préstamo.
texts.en:
José wants to grow his business by buying merchandise to offer a larger quantity and a variety of styles to his customers.  He’ll buy sandals, new clothing, and crafts to take advantage of the coming season and be able to meet any possible demands for his products.

Because of his good management of the previous loan, his income has been better and he was able to repay the loan on time.

loans.use: to buy inventory for the upcoming season.

loans.name: Marlene Maribel

texts.es:
Marlene es una mujer joven de 19 años, soltera que vive con su madre en una parroquia rural del cantón Santo Domingo que es un cantón de la provincia de "Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas" el cual es uno de los más densamente poblados del Ecuador. Tiene un gran atractivo ya que posee varios monumentos distribuidos por toda la ciudad entre el que está el Monumento al Indio Colorado, sector conocido como la “Y del Colorado”.  Santo Domingo es un cantón privilegiado, con gente maravillosa, trabajadora y emprendedora, que lucha incansablemente por el desarrollo y progreso, que recibe al turista siempre con los brazos abiertos y los lleva a conocer lo maravilloso de su cultura y entorno. 

Marlene estudia y trabaja. Ella cría cerdos desde hace 4 años para así aportar a la economía de su hogar. Se levanta en la mañana muy temprano para dar de comer a sus cerdos antes de ir al colegio y luego por la tarde al volver a casa se dedica al cuidado de su criadero. Nos cuenta que en una ocasión dos cerdos enfermaron por lo que tuvo que sacrificarlos; esto fue duro para ella ya que perdió su inversión. Ella quiere un crédito que le permita terminar de construir el criadero de sus cerdos y comprar más. De esta manera ella piensa tener mejores ingresos para así poder seguir estudiando y tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Marlene is a 19 year old single woman who lives with her mother in a rural Santo Domingo settlement within the “Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas” province, one of the most densely populated in Ecuador.  It attracts many people because it has many monuments around the city, among them is the “Monumento al Indio Colorado” monument in the sector known as “Y del Colorado.”  Santo Domingo is a special place, with wonderful, hardworking, enterprising people who work tirelessly toward progress and development, and who receive tourists with open arms and demonstrate their wonderful culture and environment.

Marlene works and goes to school.  She’s also been raising pigs for the past four years to help out with the household finances.  She rises very early in the morning to feed her pigs before going to school, and then returns home to tend to her livestock.  She says that there was a time when two of her pigs got sick and she had to euthanize them.  This was difficult for her since she lost her investment.  She would like a loan so that she can finish building her pig pen and buy more pigs.  In this way she plans to increase her income so that she can continue her studies and have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to build a pig pen and buy pigs.

loans.name: Ayub

texts.en:
Ayub lives in Mombasa, Kenya. He is single and is engaged in the business of selling building stones and sand. This business has been in operation for ten years. Ayub was a loader (loading items into trucks) initially. He got a soft loan from a friend, purchased some stock, paid off the loan and continued.

He learned of Milango from her friends. He is applying for a loan of KES 40,000 to purchase additional stock of sand and stones.

His main challenge is lack of capital and inflation. Ayub’s future aspirations include setting up hardware and purchasing a vehicle. He will use the additional income to purchase a vehicle to transport the building materials.

loans.use: To purchase additional stock of sand and stones.

loans.name: Luciano

texts.es:
Luciano, nuevamente se ha decidido a obtener otro crédito, porque lo necesita para contratar personas para  la recolección de la cosecha puesto que dos manzanas de tierra cultivadas de granos básicos el cual le ayudado a poder vender la cosecha y dejar para su familia.
El está muy feliz por los créditos anteriores ya que le han ayudado mucho para su familia y de esa forma ha podido apoyar a su familia y vivir en mejores condiciones de vida. Este es su tercer prestamo en la institucion, de los cuales dos han sido de este fondo, pero el ultimo lo cancelo con unos dias de atraso, por esto no ha podido republicar su prestamo.
texts.en:
Luciano has decided to request another loan because he needs to hire people to gather his harvest of two acres of basic grains so that he can sell most of it, while keeping some to feed his family.

He’s very grateful for the previous loans because they were very helpful to his family and he’s been able to help them live in better conditions.  This is his third loan through the institution, two of which have been through this fund, but he paid off the third only a few days behind schedule.  Because of this he hasn’t been able republish his loan.

loans.use: to payfor field hands.

loans.name: Rukiya

texts.en:
Rukiya owns a beauty shop which has been in operation for the last three years. She lives in Likoni, Kenya. Rukiya is married and has four children. She began the business from her own personal savings and a "merry go round" scheme where people contribute and lend to one person in turns/rounds.

She is applying for a loan of 60,000 Kenyan shillings (KES) to purchase clothing, shoes, hand bags and cosmetics in preparation for the Christmas festivities.

Rukiya's main challenge is seasonality in her business and inflation. She looks forward to owning a wholesale and a car to transport her stock. She will use the additional income from this loan to renovate her shop.

loans.use: to purchase clothing, shoes, handbags and cosmetics.

loans.name: Mario Efigenio

texts.es:
Mario, está solicitando un préstamo nuevo, ya que quiere pagar por la recolección de la cosecha, ayudándole a pagar la mano de obra y trasladarlo a su vivienda.
Este préstamo le ayudara para tener en su casa la cosecha y poder disponer de ella, él tiene buena experiencia con los prestamos, logro obtener una buena cosecha.
texts.en:
