Mario is asking for a new loan because he wants to pay for collecting his harvest.  This will help him pay for labor and transportation to his home.

This loan will help him have the harvest in his home where he can assure its disposition.  He has good experience with loans and  he had a good harvest.

loans.use: to pay for labor to collect and transport his harvest.

loans.name: Caroline

texts.en:
Caroline lives in Likoni area of the Coastal Province, Kenya. She is married and has two children. She sells clothes at the market stalls beyond the course way. Likoni has a huge number of low to middle class people. 

Caroline began her business from her personal savings. She learned about Milango from her friends, decided to join and is applying for a loan of 20,000 Kenyan shillings (KES) to purchase more clothes. Her main challenge is inflation, which has raised the cost of many commodities.

Caroline’s future goals include building her own business premise. She will use the additional income from this loan to purchase school shoes for sale.

loans.use: to purchase more clothes.

loans.name: Clarice

texts.en:
Clarice lives in Changamwe, Kenya. She is married and has five school-going children. Clarice owns a shop which she opened five months ago. 

Clarice is applying for a loan of 20,000 Kenyan shillings (KES) to purchase stock of retail products such as sugar, flour, etc. Her main challenge is the competition she faces from the other shopkeepers. Clarice will use the extra income from this business to educate her children.

loans.use: to purchase stock of retail products such as sugar, flour, etc.

loans.name: Cynthia Daniela

texts.es:
Cynthia es una joven mujer de 24 años, soltera quien vive con su madre en la ciudad de Santo Domingo que es la cuarta ciudad con más población del Ecuador después de Guayaquil, Quito y Cuenca. Su población va creciendo rápidamente ya que cuenta con un rico comercio y el mayor mercado ganadero del país. La provincia tiene de superficie 3.857 km² - 352.300 ha a una altitud de 625 msnm. Su temperatura habitual es de unos 25.5°C  y a veces llega a los 38 °C. Toda la provincia de "Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas"  figura como parte del territorio montañoso de la costa, de la cordillera occidental, históricamente conocida como Provincia de Yumbos y Capital de los Colibríes. Está ubicado en el trópico húmedo de América Latina. Es una provincia considerada nueva ya que fue creada en el 2007.

Ella se dedica a vender productos de aseo desde hace dos años; lo aprendió de su madre. Cynthia quiere invertir en la compra de mercadería; quiere aprovechar la época navideña para así incrementar sus ingresos. Las personas compran este tipo de mercadería para armar canastillas navideñas y regalarlas en esta temporada.

Cynthia sueña con continuar sus estudios y se esfuerza por cumplir este objetivo. Espera mejorar su condición económica y ayudar a su familia
texts.en:
Cynthia is a 24-year-old young person. She is single and lives with her mother in Santo Domingo city. It is the fourth largest city in Ecuador after Guayaquil, Quito and Cuenca. This city has a rapidly growing population. It has active commerce and the largest cattle market in the country. This province covers 3,857 kilometers and it has an altitude of 635 meters. The usual temperature averages around 25.5 centigrade but at times the temperature can reach 38 centigrade. The province of “Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas” is a mountainous territory near the coast, in the western mountains. It is historically known at the Yumbos Province and the capital of Colibries. It is located in the humid tropics of Latin America. It is a new province. It was established in 2007.
 For the past two years Cynthia has been selling cleaning products. She learned this business from her mother. She would like to buy more merchandise. She would like to take advantage of this holiday period to make more money. People buy this type of merchandise for their Christmas baskets that they give as gifts during this time. Cynthia’s dream is to continue studying and make the effort to meet this goal. She would like to improve her economic conditions and help her family.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her business.

loans.name: Paul

texts.en:
Paul is a timber dealer in Changamwe, Kenya. He is married and has two children. He began this business 8 years ago by selling scrap timber and later moved on and purchased logging machines.

Paul learned about Milango from friends and joined in order to access funding for his business. He is applying for a loan of 40,000 KES to purchase a new stock of timber. He looks forward to being an exporter and importer of timber and timber products in the future; though the main challenges are price fluctuations and the high cost of stock and equipment. The extra income from this loan will enable Paul to educate and feed his children.

loans.use: to purchase a new stock of timber.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sodas, sausages, ham, salsa, mortadella, seasonings, potatoes and juices.

loans.name: Ecra

texts.en:
Ecra is a resident of Changamwe, Kenya. She is a clothes dealer; a business she began 5 years ago. She is married and has three school-going children. 

Ecra was introduced to Milango by her friends; she joined in order to access funding for her business. Ecra is applying for a loan of 80,000 KES to purchase a new stock of clothes in preparation for the Christmas festivities. She will use the extra income from this loan to educate her children.

loans.use: to purchase a new stock of clothes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy green plantains.

loans.name: Isabella

texts.en: Isabella is a resident of Changamwe, Kenya. She is married and has two school going children. Isabella owns a boutique, a business she began seven years ago. She is applying for a loan of KSH 80,000 to purchase a new stock of clothes in preparation for the Christmas festivities.Her main challenge is during the low season; she makes few sales during such periods. The extra income from this loan will be used to improve the standard of living of her family.

loans.use: To to purchase a new stock of clothes

loans.name: Teresa De Jesus

texts.es:
Teresa, El préstamo lo utilizara para fortalecer mas su negocio y comprar mercadería: faldas, pantalones, camisas los productos de primera necesidad como: arroz, frijoles, azúcar, aceite de esa forma podrá surtir mas su negocio y obtener más ingresos.
El sueño de teresa es establecer un mini súper y ofrecer variedad y de esa forma poder darles lo necesario a su familia.
texts.en: This loan will help Theresa to build her business and buy merchandise such as skirts, pants, blouses and other necessary items such as rice, beans, sugar and oil. In this way she will be able to provide a greater variety of products and earn a larger income. Theresa’s dream is to of establish a mini-market, where she will sell a variety of goods. In this way she will be able to provide her family with basic necessities.

loans.use: to buy skirts, pants, blouses and basic need products.

loans.name: Stephen

texts.en:
Stephen lives in Changamwe area of Coast province, Kenya. He is married and has nine children, five of whom are in school. He owns a dry fish business and has been in operation for one year. It’s a business he began in order to get money to support his family. 

Stephen is applying for a loan of 20,000 Kenyan shillings (KES) to purchase more dry fish for sale. His main challenges are the lack of capital to purchase more stock. The extra income from this loan will help him educate his children.

loans.use: to purchase more dry fish for sale.

loans.name: Las Preciosas Group

texts.es: El banco de emprendimiento Las Preciosas entrando a su 2 do ciclo conformado por 10 integrantes que viven en la zona del km 20,  zona la Guardia cuentan con negocio y actividad propias, la  presidenta es la Sra. Patricia de edad de 42 años vive en la zona hace un año, su actividad es la venta comida, vende  refrigerios  en su mismo domicilio, su estado civil convive con el sr. Abel el cual es carpintero  y tienen 3 hijo a su cargo que se encuentran estudiando, la Sra. Patricia se levanta a tempranas horas de la mañana para preparar sus platillos, para después ir a venderlos, el dinero del  crédito lo utilizara en la compra de insumos, para la elaboración de sus refrigerios como papa yuca, arroz y fideo, la Sra. Patricia es una persona muy trabajadora se siente agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.Los señores están muy agradecidos con nuestra entidad por haber confiado en ellos y brindarles un apoyo para poder crecer en sus negocios y actividades.
texts.en: The “Precious Undertaking” Bank is beginning its second cycle. It has ten members that live at the twentieth kilometer of Guardia. They have their own businesses. The president of this group is Mrs. Patricia, 42 years old. She has lived in the zone for a year. She sells refreshments from her house. She lives with Mr. Abel. He is a carpenter. Together they have three school-aged children. Mrs. Patricia gets up early in the morning in order to prepare her food. Afterwards she goes out to sell. The money from this loan will be used to buy ingredients in order to make her refreshments, such as potatoes, yucca, rice and noodles. Mrs. Patricia is a hardworking person and she appreciates this organization that provides her with this support. The members are very thankful for this organization that has confidence in them and supports them so that they can grow their businesses and activities.

loans.use: To buy ingredients in order to make her refreshments, such as potatoes, yucca and rice.

loans.name: Elsa Johana

texts.es:
Elsa es una joven mujer de 21 años y soltera. Vive en la ciudad de Santo Domingo que es un cantón y ciudad de la nueva Provincia de Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas, que era parroquia rural de Quito,  Santo Domingo está entre la costa y la sierra del Ecuador, punto de enlace entre Quito, Guayaquil, Portoviejo,  y otras ciudades importantes. Situado en los flancos externos de la cordillera occidental, así como en la planicie costeña inferior a los 1000 msnm, es la zona de mayor pluviosidad del país. Tiene una gran riqueza hidrológica: existen cinco cuencas y micro cuencas importantes. Es una zona climática lluviosa subtropical, posee una temperatura promedio de 22 °C.

Es propietaria de un local de venta de ropa casual desde hace tres años y desea invertir en mercadería para aprovechar las ventas navideñas que son muy altas. Ella tiene su cartera de clientes la cual ha sido cuidadosamente realizada ya que en ocasiones ha perdido dinero dando créditos a personas que no han pagado. Sin embargo ella es muy optimista y quiere alcanzar su sueño que es poder mejorar su estilo de vida. Es el segundo crédito que realiza, siendo ella una cliente muy puntual y cumplida.
texts.en:
Elsa is a young 21 year old single woman who lives in Santo Domingo, a settlement in the new province of Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas.  This was a rural parish in Quito, Santo Domingo.  Santo Domingo lies between the coastline and the mountains of Ecuador, a link between Quito, Guayaquil, Portoviejo, and other important cities.  It’s located on the outer flanks of the western range and the lower coastal plain, 1000 meters above sea level.  It’s the area with the greatest amount of rainfall in the country and has a great hydrological value.  There are five basins and important micro basins.  It’s a rainy subtropical climate with an average temperature of 22 °C.

Elsa has had a small casual clothing store for three years and would like to invest in merchandise to take advantage of the Christmas season, when sales are high.  She has her list of steady customers that has been carefully put together, as there have been times when she’s lost money by selling on credit and then the people don’t pay.  However she is very optimistic and wants to achieve her dream of improving her quality of life.  This will be her second loan and she has record of being punctual with her payments.

loans.use: to buy clothing for resale

loans.name: Bernardina Santos

texts.es:
Bernardina, está nuevamente solicitando préstamo,  para la compra de frutas como piña, mangos, papayas, y otras frutas para el negocio, esta inversión espera que le dé mejores ganancias para su negocio manteniéndose en el mercado y aumentando cada día los clientes.
Ella ha tenido buenas experiencias en el manejo de los préstamos.
texts.en:
Bernardina is asking for a loan once again, in order to buy fruits such as pineapple, mangos, papayas, and other fruit for her business.  This investment should increase her business income, allow her to remain in the market, and win new customers each day.

She has had good experience managing loans.

loans.use: to buy fruits.

loans.name: Rebeccah

texts.en:
Rebecca operates a mobile money transfer shop at Changamwe, Kenya for the last two years. The mobile money transfer has been of great assistance to many who cannot access formal banking system due to distance. She is single. Besides this business, Rebecca also has rental houses from where she gets income on rent on monthly basis.
Her challenges include the low till/float in the transfer account which limits the amount she can hold at any given time. Rebecca is applying for a loan of Ksh 80,000 to purchase mobile phone accessories, mobile phone air time and increase the float.
Her future aspirations include owning a chain of mobile money transfer shops. The additional income obtained from this venture will help her pursue further education and improve her living standard. Rebecca is happy about the transformation Milango is making in the community.

loans.use: To purchase mobile phone accessories, phone air time and increase float.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy ingredients.

loans.name: Tomasa Del Carmen

texts.es:
Tomasa, nuevamente solicita otro préstamo para invertirlo en su negocio, quiere comprar materia prima para la elaboración de hamacas, este negocio le ayudo a  poder obtener más clientes y comprar materiales como hilos, de cáñamo y de seda de esa forma mantener su negocio.
Ella se siente feliz con los prestamos anteriores el cual le han ayudado a mejor en su familia y tener lo necesario para vivir.
texts.en:
Tomasa, nuevamente solicita otro préstamo para invertirlo en su negocio, quiere comprar materia prima para la elaboración de hamacas, este negocio le ayudo a  poder obtener más clientes y comprar materiales como hilos, de cáñamo y de seda de esa forma mantener su negocio.
Ella se siente feliz con los prestamos anteriores el cual le han ayudado a mejor en su familia y tener lo necesario para vivir.

loans.use: to buy supplies

loans.name: Jane

texts.en:
Jane lives in the Likoni area of Coast Province, Kenya. She has two children. Jane owns a retail shop which has been in operation for the last eight years. Jane accumulated some personal savings and began selling items in small quantities.

She is applying for a loan of 20,000 Kenyan shillings (KES) to purchase more retail stock e.g. sugar, sweets, biscuits, etc. Jane learned of Milango from her friends and decided to join in order to access credit. Her main challenge is high transport costs which in turn raises the cost of goods. 

Jane is also engaged in supplying items to other shops by using a motorbike. Her future aspirations include setting up a wholesale and purchasing a pick up.

loans.use: to purchase more retail stock e.g. sugar, sweets, biscuits, etc

loans.name: Mauricio

texts.es:
Mauricio, vive con su esposa y su hijo de 15 años de edad, él se dedica a vender agua embotellada, este oficio lo inicio hace diez años trabaja de 7: am a 5: pm de lunes a domingo. 
El préstamo lo utilizara para comprar una bicicleta, para poder repartir agua  embotellada y de esa forma podrá tener más facilidad y rapidez con la entrega de la venta.
El sueño de seguir trabajando,tener más clientes, mejorar su negocio y poder darles a su familia lo mejor.
texts.en:
Mauricio, vive con su esposa y su hijo de 15 años de edad, él se dedica a vender agua embotellada, este oficio lo inicio hace diez años trabaja de 7: am a 5: pm de lunes a domingo. 
El préstamo lo utilizara para comprar una bicicleta, para poder repartir agua  embotellada y de esa forma podrá tener más facilidad y rapidez con la entrega de la venta.
El sueño de seguir trabajando,tener más clientes, mejorar su negocio y poder darles a su familia lo mejor.

loans.use: Para comprar una bicicleta .

loans.name: Evelyn Sarai

texts.es:
Evelyn, actualmente vive con sus dos hijos de 6 y 4 años de edad, ella se dedica a vender bisutería y cosméticos los días miércoles y domingo.
El préstamo lo necesita para comprar mercadería de bisutería como: aretes, pulseras, collares y cosméticos como: bases, rubores, esmaltes, debido a la época de diciembre que es cuando se vende más y podrá obtener mejores  ingresos, por eso quiere realizar la inversion.
El objetivo de Evelyn es siempre mantener su negocio estable y poder darle una mejor vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Evelyn lives with her two children, ages 6 and 4, and sells costume jewelry and cosmetics on Wednesdays and Sundays.

She needs this loan to buy jewelry such as earrings, bracelets, necklaces, and cosmetics such as bases, rouges, and nail polish for the December season when sales increase and she can increase her income.  This is why she wants to make this investment.

Evelyn’s objective is to maintain a stable business and be able to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy jewelry and cosmetics.

loans.name: Vanessa Gissell

texts.es:
Vanessa Gissell, de 26 años de edad, casada desde hace un año, vive en Chivana  Omoa Cortes.
Su esposo también se dedica al comercio.
Vanessa, hace un año se dedica a la venta de ropa usada, vende camisetas, vestidos, pantalones, camisas,  faldas, blusas y también zapatos para damas. Ella inicio este negocio con la ayuda de un hermano, así fue incrementando el inventario. Las ventas las realiza en su casa y de manera ambulante de acuerdo a pedidos, ya tiene muchos clientes en la comunidad donde vive.
Este préstamo es el primero que solicita y es para invertir en  ropa como vestidos, blusas, pantalones, camisetas, camisas y faldas, para la venta  aprovechando  la temporada de navidad.
Esta muy emocionada con este negocio y quiere verlo surtido para incrementar las ventas.
texts.en:
Vanessa Gissell, 26, has been married for a year.  She lives in Chivana Omoa, Cortes.  Her husband is also a merchant.

Vanessa has been selling used clothes for a year.  She sells t-shirts, dresses, pants, shirts, skirts, blouses and also women’s shoes.  She started the business with her brother’s help and gradually has increased inventory.  Her sales take place at home and also in an itinerant manner based on prior orders; she has many customers in the community where she lives.

This is the first loan she’s asked for and it’s to invest in clothes like dresses, blouses, pants, t-shirts, shirts and skirts to sell taking advantage of the Christmas season.  She is very excited with the business and wants to see it well-stocked to increase sales.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Jose Heriberto

texts.es:
José, vive con su esposa y sus seis hijos, él se dedica a vender pan dulce y pan francés en una bicicleta todos los días de lunes a domingo.
El préstamo lo utilizara para comprar dos bicicletas para vender el pan esto le ayudara para abastecer a mas personas y aumentar en clientes porque tendrá varios lugares donde repartirlo y de esa forma podrá tener mejores ingresos.
El sueño de José es apoyar a su familia para que vivan en mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
José lives with his wife and six children and sells “pan dulce” and French bread on a bicycle every day from Monday to Sunday.

He will use the money from this loan to buy two bikes so he can sell his bread.  This will help him deliver to more people and increase his number of customers because he will have various places to deliver.  In this way he can increase his income.

José’s dream is to support his family so that they will have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy two bikes.

loans.name: Adelina

texts.es:
Adelina, vive con sus tres hijos de 14,11 y 9 años de edad, ella se dedica a la compra y venta de ganado hace cinco años debido a la necesidad de crecer a sus hijos inicio este oficio todos los días.
El préstamo lo utilizara para el complemento en la compra de un terreno, el cual le ayudara para contar con un inmueble a su nombre, en el cual construira su vivienda y podra tener el ganado.
El sueño de Adelina es ayudarles a sus hijos a estudiar y contribuir con los gastos de la casa.
texts.en:
Adelina lives with her three children, ages 14, 11, and 9.  She’s been buying and selling livestock for five years because of the need to care for her children.  She does this every day.

She will use the money from this loan to help buy some land, which will help her have a building in her name where she can set up her home and also keep her livestock.

Adelina’s dream is to be able to help her children with their studies and contribute toward the household expenses.

loans.use: to buy land.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es: Juana, de 48 años, es una mujer buena, amable y muy emprendedora, es una mujer que no tiene miedo a las dificultades que le pone en destino, ya que pudo criar sola a su única hija y le dio educación ya que esta separa de quien fue su conviviente y desde ese momento se hizo cargo del hogar sola, vive junto a su única hija y su nieto en su casa propia, en donde todos los días comparten juntos las ganas y entusiasmo de salir adelante y tener una mejor calidad de vida. El trabajo de Juana consiste en el corte y confección de prendas de vestir, se encarga de realizar sus propios diseños, además realizar la costura de sus clientes, quienes la buscan siempre para que con sus mágicas manos les haga su costura ya que confían en que ella los hará un muy buen trabajo, ella tiene una taller pequeño en su casa y es desde ahí que ella realiza todo su trabajo, se inicio en su trabajo hace 20 años, inicio haciendo cosas simples y con el tiempo y la experiencia se decidió realizar cosas maá complicadas hasta lograr un buen acabado como el que tiene ahora, trabaja sola y esta mas que contenta de hacer lo que le gusta. Le esta yendo muy bien, ya que tiene muchos clientes quienes la buscan muy a menudo, además cuando no hay clientes, ella realiza su confección y así, puede vender en su tiempo libre, al principio se sentía de poca utilidad en su casa, ya que solo esperaba del dinero que ingresaba con el trabajo de su conviviente, pero se decidió hacer algo y desde entonces está mas que contenta de poder realizar este trabajo que le ha permitido realizar su vida con cierta tranquilidad, ahora desea trabajar mas y mas para así, poder seguir creciendo con este trabajo. Este será el primer préstamo con MFP, esta muy contenta de saber que tendrá un respaldo económico a través del préstamo que le otorgaran ya que así podrá concretar algunos planes que tiene para su negocio, por otro lado se compromete a ser una socia cumplida y a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual ya que quiere compenetrarse rápido a su banco comunal del cual tiene buenas referencias que son muy solidarios y puntuales. Con el monto solicitado 1000 soles, comprará materiales para poder seguir con su trabajo, entre las cosas que comprará serán, telas, hilos, elásticos y moldes, para así poder confeccionar en mayor cantidad.
texts.en:
Juana, age 48, is a good, kind, and very enterprising woman.  She is a woman who is not afraid of the difficulties encountered along the way to her destiny.  She was able to raise her only daughter by herself.  She gave her daughter an education.  She separated from her live-in partner, and from that time on she has been in charge of her household.  She lives with her only daughter and her grandson in her own house.  Every day they share the desire and enthusiasm of getting ahead and having a better quality of life.

Juana makes clothes.  She makes her own designs, and she makes clothes for her customers.  They always seek her out so that her magic hands will make their garments.  They have faith that she will do a very good job.  She has a small workshop in her house where she does all of her work.

She started her work 20 years ago.  She started making simple things.  With time and experience she decided to make more complicated things until she managed the good finishing touch that she now has.

She works alone, and she is more than happy to be doing what she likes.  Things are going very well for her.  She has a lot of customers who ask for her very often.  Also, when there are no customers she makes her designs.  That way she is able to sell in her free time.

In the beginning she felt of little use in her house.  She only waited for the money that her live-in partner earned from his work.  But, she decided to do something.  From then on she is more than happy to be able to do this work.  It has allowed her to live her life with a measure of comfort.  She now wishes to work more and more in order to be able to continue growing with this work.

This will be her first loan with MFP.  She is very happy to know that she will have financial support through the loan that she was granted.  This way she will be able to firm up some plans she has for her business.  She pledges to be a responsible member and to make her payments punctually.  She wants to work well with her communal bank, where there are good references about being supportive and punctual

She will use the requested 1,000 soles to buy materials to be able to continue with her work.  Among the things she will buy are fabric, needles, elastics, and patterns.  This way she will be able to sew in greater quantity.

loans.use: to buy fabric, needles, elastics, and patterns.

loans.name: Mateo

texts.es:
Mateo, vive con su esposa y cuatro hijos, él se dedica a vender frutas y verduras, el negocio lo inicio por iniciativa propia trabaja de lunes a domingo.
El préstamo lo utilizara para comprar más mercadería para surtir mas su negocio como: bananas, manzanas, papaya, repollo, yuca, pipianes, de esa forma podrá tener variedad de frutos frescos, debido a la época de diciembre donde se vende más y tener más ingresos. 
La aspiración de mateo es que su familia tenga mejor calidad de vida y mantener siempre su negocio estable.
texts.en:
Mateo lives with his wife and their four children. He sells fruits and vegetables, an activity he started by his own initiative, and he works Mondays to Sundays.
The loan he is requesting will be used to buy more products to stock up his shop such as : bananas, apples, papaya, cabbage, cassava and pipiánes (pipián is a variety of squash known as ‘cushaw’ in the United States). He will thus be able to have a wider variety of fresh fruits, and increase his income in December, the time of the year when he sells more.
Mateo’s goals are to improve his family’s standard of living and to always keep his activity steady.

loans.use: To buy bananas, apples, papaya, cabbage, cassava and pipíanes.

loans.name: Juan Jose

texts.es:
Juan, vive con su esposa y dos hijos, él se dedica a sembrar granos básicos: frijoles y maíz,este oficio lo aprendió de su padre hace quince años y trabaja de lunes a domingo de 7:00 am a 3:00 pm.
El préstamo lo necesita para la recolección de la cosecha ya que tiene que pagar personas para que le ayuden y de esa forma poder venderla y dejar una parte para el consumo de su familia.
El objetivo de Juan es siempre tener mejores cosechas todos los años y seguir trabajando con la institución para que de esa forma poder darle lo necesario a su familia.
texts.en:
Juan lives with his wife and their two children. He is a farmer and he grows basic grains such as beans and maize. He learned this activity from his parents fifteen years ago, and he works Mondays to Sundays from 7 am to 3 pm.
The loan he is requesting will be used to pay for laborers that will help him harvesting his crops, a part of which will be sold while he will keep another part to for his family to consume.
Juan’s goals are to get better crops every year, and to keep on working with the institution to be able to provide his family with the basic necessities.

loans.use: To pay for laborer that will help him harvest his crops.

loans.name: Fanny Mabel

texts.es:
Fanny, vive con su esposo y tres hijos de 25,20 y 16 años de edad, ella  se dedica a vender panes con pollo,  en el centro de la ciudad hace dos años lo inicio por iniciativa propia debido a la demanda de los clientes vende todos los días de lunes a domingo.
El préstamo lo utilizara para comprar materia prima como: salchichas, pan, aceite, repollo, pollo, condimentos, gaseosas y de esa forma podrá cubrir las necesidades de su familia puesto que tendrá lo necesario para la venta y obtener más ingresos.
El sueño de Fanny es crecer su negocio y luego tener más variedad para ofrecerles a los clientes y darles lo necesario a su familia.
texts.en:
Fanny lives with her husband and 3 children aged 25, 20 and 16. She engages in selling chicken sandwiches in the city center. She started this activity two years ago out of her own initiative because of her customers’ requests. She works every day, Mondays to Sundays.
The loan she is requesting will be used to buy basic ingredients such as sausages, bread, oil, cabbage, chicken, dressings and fizzy drinks;  in this way she will succeed in providing for her family’s necessities, as she will have what she needs to for her activity and will therefore increase her earnings.
Fanny’s dreams are to make her activity grow, to have a wider variety of products to offer to her customers and to provide her family with the basic necessities.

loans.use: To buy sausages, bread, oil, cabbage, chicken, dressings and fizzy drinks.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to paint his new salon

loans.name: Fermin Antonio

texts.es:
Fermín, vive con un tío, es soltero, se dedica a la panadería, aprendió por medio de unos amigos, no tiene un horario fijo y cuenta con experiencia en esta actividad.
El está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de materia prima como harina, huevos, azúcar, bolsas plásticas y leña, todos son necesarios para la elaboración del pan, con este préstamo su negocio estará más fuerte y con más capacidad para producir.
Su aspiración es tener casa propia, crecer en su panadería y vivir cómodamente de su negocio.
texts.en:
Fermín is single and he lives with an uncle. He is a baker, a profession he learned from some friends: he does not work fixed hours and he is experienced in this activity.
He is requesting a loan to buy basic ingredients such as flour, eggs and sugar and materials such as plastic bags and firewood, items he needs to prepare bread. Thanks to this loan his activity will be stringer and will have a better production rate.
He aims at having a house of his own, make his bakery grow and to live comfortably thanks to his activity.

loans.use: To buy flour, eggs, sugar, plastic bags and firewood.

loans.name: Katherine

texts.es:
Katherine, de 22 años, es una mujer joven, amable y emprendedora, es madre soltera de un menor de 5 años a quien cría y brinda lo mejor que puede darle, desde que su hijo es muy pequeño, tubo que enfrentar sola el criarlo ya que el que fue su conviviente no se hizo cargo de nada, pero como toda madre saco todas las fuerzas que tubo y así le brinda lo mejor a su hijo, ella vive en casa de sus padres a lado de ellos y su hermano de 6 años.  El trabajo de Katherine consistirá en la venta de ropa, realizara esta actividad entre sus amigos, vecinos y familiares, además de iniciar con esta actividad, también se dedica a realizar algunas otras actividades en un aserradero de la ciudad, tiene que trabajar mucho ya que tiene que mantener a su hijo quien a esta edad requiere de muchas cosas para su mejor crecimiento, esta recién iniciándose en la actividad de venta de ropa y espera que le vaya muy bien, trabajará sola y esta muy convencida de poder realizar una buena inversión.
Por lo que ha hecho su propio estudio, reconociendo las necesidades de sus amigos, por ello esta convencida de que podrá realizar su venta de ropa sin ninguna dificultad ya que conoce a mucha gente y son clientes potenciales para su negocio. Tiene como objetivo principal el de consolidarse y poder crecer de a poco en este trabajo. Este será el primer préstamo con MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboración, para continuar con sus objetivos, Por otro lado se compromete de cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de manera puntual y responsable. Además esta muy contenta de ser parte de su banco comunal ya que tiene como referencia que todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarios. Con el monto solicitado 1000 soles, comprará mercadería (ropa) y otros productos mas para iniciar su venta.
texts.en:
22-year old Katherine is friendly, enterprising young woman. She is a single mother with a 5-year old whom she raises and provides for as best she can. Ever since her son was very small, she has had to bring him up alone since her partner at the time took no responsibility for anything. However, like all mothers, she made a huge effort and manages to provide the best for him. Katherine lives in her parents’ house along with them and her 6-year old son.

To earn a living Katherine plans to sell clothing to friends, neighbours, and relatives. As well as this job she works in one of the town’s sawmills. She has to work a lot as she has her son to support. At his age he requires many things to ensure he grows properly. She started the clothes business recently and hopes it will do well. She will be working alone and is quite certain that it will be a good investment.

Katherine has researched the market and knows what her friends need so she is sure there won’t be any problems with the business. She knows many people who are potential customers. Her main objective is to build a strong business and expand slowly. 

This will be her first loan with MFP and she is hoping to get a lot out of the relationship so she can achieve her objectives. She promises to pay back the loan money punctually and responsibly. In addition she is very happy to be part of her community bank where all the members are responsible, committed people. With the 1000 soles she is seeking, Katherine plans to buy more clothing as well as other products so her new venture will do well.

loans.use: to buy clothing

loans.name: Ana Maria Dolores

texts.es:
Ana, se dedica a una pupuseria, vive con su familia, lleva seis años en el negocio cuenta con varios clientes y ella depende económicamente de esta actividad. Actualmente necesita comprar gas por mayoreo y maíz además de unos ingredientes para el negocio, por eso solicita un préstamo para realizar las diferentes compras y mantener en su negocio todo lo necesario para la producción y venta de las pupusas.
Su aspiración con respecto a préstamo ejercer una buena inversión que le permita desarrollarse, pagando puntualmente las cuotas y al final que sus ventas mejoren.
texts.en:
Ana lives with her family and she runs a pupuseria (a shop selling 'pupusas', a traditional Salvadoran dish made of thick, hand-made corn tortilla filled with a blend of either cheese, vegetables or meat). She has been engaged in this activity for 6 years, she has many customers and she economically depends on this activity. She currently needs to buy gas at wholesale price and some ingredients for her shop, and she is requesting a loan to invest it in different purchases to stock up her shop with everything she needs to produce and sell pupusas.
From the loan she expects it to be a good investment that will help her improving  herself, she expects to punctually pay her dues; finally she hopes that her sales will increase.

loans.use: To buy gas at wholesale price and maize.

loans.name: Lina

texts.es:
Lina, de 47 años, es una mujer buena y amable, es madre de tres hijos de los cuales uno ya es mayor de edad y los menores tienen 18 y 14 años, ella tiene que criar sola a sus menores hijos ya que esta separa del padre de ellos, tiene una casa propia en donde vive a lado e sus dos menores hijos y una nieta que es hija de sus hijo mayor. El trabajo de Lina consiste en el crear y diseñar prendas de vestir, cuando tiene clientes deja de lado sus creaciones y comienza con el de realizar la costura de sus clientes, pero cuando esta desocupada comienza a hacer sus propios diseños y creaciones, tiene su pequeño taller en su casa y lleva realizando este trabajo por 18 años, esto le permitió dar educación y alimentar a su familia por mucho tiempo, trabaja sola y esta muy contenta ya que le esta yendo bien aun que hay veces que tiene sus altas y bajas.
Al principio cuando se inicio en esta actividad tenia dificultades como el de no saber muy bien el trabajo y tuvo algunos errores, pero aprendió rápido y se convirtió en una excelente costurera, ahora tiene mucho clientes quienes le llevan muchos trabajos para hacer, tiene como planes el de poder empezar a vender en grandes cantidades sus propios diseños. Este será el crédito numero 18 con MFP, Lina es fundadora del banco comunal al que pertenece, esta muy contenta de saber que todos estos años pudo trabajar a lado de personas muy responsables y que no permitieron que se desintegre, esta muy contenta de saber que le seguirán apoyando con el crédito que necesita para así poder concretar sus planes, mientras ella se compromete a ser muy puntual y sobre todo seguir siendo la cliente responsables que siempre fue.
Con el monto solicitado 1200 soles, comprará materiales para segur realizando su costura, antre las cosas que comprará serán elásticos, telas y otros productos mas.
texts.en:
47-year old Lina is a lovely friendly woman with three children, one of whom is an adult and the other two are 18 and 14 years old. She has to raise the younger ones by herself as she is separated from their father. She lives in her own home with the children and a granddaughter who is the child of her oldest son.

Lina designs and makes clothing. When customers approach her, she puts aside her own design work and starts on whatever sewing her customers require. However, when she hasn’t any other work on hand, she works on her own designs and creations. She has a small workshop in her home and has been doing this work for 18 years. The income from it has allowed her to educate and feed her family for a long time. She works alone and is very happy as all is going well although from time to time there are setbacks.

When Lina started the business, there were many difficulties such as not knowing how to do the work well. She made some mistakes but learned quickly and became an excellent seamstress. Now she has many clients who bring her a lot of work. She has big plans for the future such as selling her own designs in larger quantities.

This will be Lina’s 18th loan with MFP. She is a founding member of her community bank and is very happy to work for many years with such responsible people who didn't allow the bank to break up. She is also very happy to know that they continue to access loans so they can achieve their goals. Lina promises to pay back the loan money punctually and continue being the responsible client she has always been.

With the S/.1200 loan, she will buy materials for the clothing she makes as well as elastic, fabric and other supplies.

loans.use: to buy sewing supplies such as elastic, fabric, and thread

loans.name: Santos Marisol

texts.es:
Santos, está soltera, vive con su madre y un hermano, vive en casa propia, lleva cinco años en el negocio de las pupusas el cual heredó de su madre, tiene experiencia con el negocio y cuenta con varios clientes.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de aceite, gas, repollo, tomates, maíz, que son los materiales necesarios para las pupusas, Este inversiones servirá para mantener todo lo necesario para realizar la venta.
La aspiración de Santos es tener siempre en el negocio todos los materiales que sean de utilidad, para el buen servicio de los clientes y tener en su familia una buena condición económica solventando todas las necesidades.
texts.en:
Santos is single, she lives with her mother and a brother in her own house and she has been engaged in selling pupusas* for five years. She inherited the activity form her mother, she is very experienced in her job and she has many customers.
She is requesting a loan to buy gas tanks, oil, cabbage, tomatoes and maize, the basic ingredients for pupusas. This investment will help her stocking up with all that she needs to produce and sell her products.
Santos aims at always having in the shop the necessary ingredients and tools she needs to offer a good service to her customers, and she aims at providing good economic conditions to her family by paying for every necessity.

<cite>*(A traditional Salvadoran dish made of thick, hand-made corn tortilla filled with a blend of either cheese, vegetables or meat)</cite>

loans.use: To buy gas tanks, oil, cabbage, tomatoes and maize.

loans.name: Norberto

texts.es: Norberto  es  una persona  muy trabajadora,  el cual  se esfuerza por  salir  adelante  día  con día, actualmente  tiene una  tienda  de  abarrotes   la  cual le  a permitido obtener  mayores  ingresos,  el esta  muy contento  por  habernos  encontrados  ya  que  nunca  había  tenido la posibilidad  de  obtener  ayuda   que  le permitiera  invertir  en su negocio, es por ello  que  en esta  ocasión requiere  realizar  la compra  de  mercancía  para   continuar   la  venta  de  productos , ve  en  el crédito la posibilidad de hacer crecer su  negocio brindado  a  sus  clientes  el excelente  servicio que  lo a caracterizado.
texts.en: Norberto is a very hard worker who makes a daily effort to get ahead.  He currently has a grocery store which has allowed him to increase his income.  He is very happy to have found us because he never has had the possibility of obtaining help toward investing in his business.  He would like to buy merchandise to continue selling products and sees that the loan will help expand business while providing enabling him to provide his customers with the excellent service to which they are accustomed.

loans.use: To buy merchandise for his grocery store.

loans.name: Ivette Marjore

texts.es:
Ivette, administra una panadería, vive con su esposo y sus 4 hijos, los cuales están estudiando, y le ayudan en los quehaceres de la panadería, ella aprendió la panadería con la ayuda de su esposo, iniciando juntos desde hace varios años.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de sacos de harina, huevos, azúcar por quintales, y otros materiales que son necesarios para la producción de pan.
Su aspiración es tener una panadería más productiva y que su familia también sientan el efecto de los beneficios en la panadería.
texts.en:
Ivette runs a bakery. She lives with her husband and their 4 children, who are studying and who help her with the various tasks of the bakery. She learned about running a bakery from her husband, as they started this activity together a few years ago.
She is requesting a loan to buy bags of flour, eggs, sugar in quintal bags (weight measure equivalent to 46 kilos) and other ingredients she needs to prepare bread.
Her goal is to run a more productive bakery and she hopes that her family can profit from the benefits of the bakery as well.

loans.use: To buy bags of flour, eggs and sugar in quintal bags.

loans.name: Manuel De Jesus

texts.es:
Manuel, vive con su esposa y su hijo de 17 años de edad, él se dedica a la agricultura y ganadería, tiene dos manzanas de terreno sembradas, además del ganado vacuno y de repasto.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de ganado de repasto, ya que por el tiempo de verano le conviene tener de este ganado, ayudándole a mantener sus actividades.
Él quiere mejorar la calidad de ganado, y poder con sus ingresos poder sostener su familia con todo lo necesario.
texts.en:
Manuel lives with his wife and their 17-year-old son. He is a farmer and a livestock breeder. He owns two manzanas (approx. 3.36 acres*) of planted land, as well as dairy and non-dairy cattle.
He is currently requesting a loan to buy non-dairy cattle, as in the summer this makes the most profitable cattle, and this helps him running his activities.
He wants to improve the quality of his cattle, and to be able to provide for his family with all the basic necessities thanks to his income.


<cite>*(one manzana = 1.68 acres)</cite>

loans.use: To buy non-dairy cattle.

loans.name: Luz

texts.es:
Luz, de 19 años, es una joven mujer, amable y muy trabajadora, es conviviente con su pareja y hasta el momento no tiene hijos. Juntos habitan en casa de su madre. Ella junto a su familia trabajan mucho para tener una mejor calidad de vida. El trabajo de Luz consiste en la venta de abarrotes, para ello cuenta con una tienda,ubicada en una calle muy concurrida y así ella recibe a diario la visita de sus clientes quienes van de manera segura sabiendo que ahí encontraran todo lo que buscan. Además de tener este trabajo, ella también labora como enfermera en una posta de salud cerca de su casa, y por las noches vende comida a lado de su pareja y así puede tener tres ingresos para el bienestar y tranquilidad de su familia. Lleva realizando sus actividades desde hace dos años ella sola, ya que antes lo hacia su madre pero ahora el negocio lo lleva ella, aunque tiene la ayuda de su madre. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que le permite tener estas tres actividades y no descuidar sus estudios. Agradece mucho que le vaya tan bien y espera poder seguir creciendo y agrandar su negocio para tener mayor ingreso. Este será el crédito número 3 con MFP, esta muy contenta de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá más segura de avanzar con su trabajo, además se compromete una vez mas de cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas, como en anteriores créditos que tuvo, además está muy contenta de pertenecer a su banco comunal ya que todos son muy responsables y solidarios.
Con el monto solicitado 2000 soles, comprará mercadería para su tienda de abarrotes, además algunos ingredientes e insumos necesarios para su venta de comida.
texts.en:
Luz, 19, is a young, kind, hard-working woman.  She lives with her common-law husband in her mother's home and they have no children yet.  Luz and her family work hard to have a better quality of life.  She runs a grocery store that is located on a very busy street where she receives the daily visit of customers who shop at her store knowing they can find everything they need.  Besides this job, she also works as a nurse at a health center near her house.  At night she and her husband sell food, so they have three sources of income for the family's well-being and security.  

She has been handling her own businesses alone since before it was her mother who did it.  Now she works alone although her mother helps, too.  What she enjoys about her work is that she is able to be involved in three activities while also studying.  She is grateful for her success and hopes to grow and expand her business to obtain more income.  

This is her third loan through MFP.  She is content knowing that she can count on financial support since this gives her more security in advancing in her work.  She is committed to paying back the loan on time, as with previous loans.  She enjoys her communal bank because all the members are responsible and supprotive.

She plans to use the 2,000 PEN loan to buy merchandise for the store and the necessary ingredients to make the food she sells.

loans.use: To buy products for her store and ingredients to prepare food.

loans.name: Agustin

texts.es:
El señor Agustin es casado, tiene 41 años de edad, cursó el segundo años de educación primaria, tiene 3 hijos los cuales están estudiando, se dedica a la artesanía, al tejido de cortes típicos, inició este trabajo como operario y hasta el momento lleva 30 años de experiencia.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de un tejar y mejorar su producción. El el futuro espera tener un negocio y mejores ganancias.
texts.en:
Augustin is 41 years old, he is married, he attended school through second grade and he has 3 children, all of whom are in school. He engages in craftsmanship, weaving traditional clothes. He started this activity as a worker and today he can count on a 30-years’ experience in the field.

He is requesting a loan to buy a loom to improve his production. In the future he hopes to own a shop and therefore improve his income.

loans.use: To buy a loom

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to gather the harvest

loans.name: Paulino Antonio

texts.es:
Paulino, solicita de nuevo otro crédito, debido a la buena atención de nuestra institución y porque necesita comprar una pulidora para facilitarle mejor su trabajo de esa forma podrá tener más eficiencia en las labores a diario realiza.
El se siente feliz por los prestamos anteriores el cual le ayudaron a crecer en su negocio y su familia vive en mejores condiciones, en la actualidad posee sueños que espera realizar a travez de esta ayuda.
texts.en:
Paulino is asking for a new loan because of the good service from our institution and because he needs to buy a polisher to do his job better. This way, he will be more efficient in the work he does every day. 

He feels happy with the previous loans. They helped him grow his business and his family have a better quality of  life. At present, he hopes to make his dreams come true with this help.

loans.use: to buy a polisher

loans.name: Marco

texts.es:
Marco, de 50 años, es una hombre amable y muy trabajador, es conviviente con su pareja con quien tiene una hija de 4 años y un hijo politico de 11 años a quien cría y quiere como un hijo. Él vive en su casa propia junto a su pareja y sus hijos, quienes dependen de él para poder tener una buena educación y alimentación.
El trabajo de Marco consiste en la fabricación de joya en oro y plata, tiene dos taller uno en la ciudad de Lima y uno en su casa, desde su casa le hacen el pedidos, en Lima los confeccionan. Tiene cinco personas trabajando para él en su taller. Nos comenta que se inicio siendo trabajador de una empresa que se dedicaba  los mismo, por ello es que decidió hacerse independiente y hoy en día le esta yendo muy bien.
De todo lo que invierte gana un porcentaje de 30 a 40 %, es por eso que es muy rentable, además de tener otros ingresos trabajando a lado de su conviviente. Espera mas adelante poner un taller en la ciudad y así evitarse de estar teniendo que esperar mucho tiempo a que le envíen sus pedidos de la ciudad de Lima. Este será el crédito número 2 con MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboración para continuar con sus objetivos, por otro ladose siente muy comprometido una vez mas en cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas como en anteriores créditos que tuvo. 
Con el monto solicitado 2000 soles, comprará oro en bruto y de ahí se encargará de darles acabado y venderlos.
texts.en:
Marco is 50 years old. He is a kind and hardworking man. He lives with his spouse, with whom he has a 4 year old daughter and an 11 year old son whom he raises as his own. He lives in his own house with his wife and children, who depend on him for their education and food. 

Marco's work is making gold and silver jewelry. He has two workshops. One in the city of Lima and one at his house. The orders are made at his house and they are filled in Lima. He has five people working for him in his workshop. He tells us that he started by working in a company doing the same thing. He decided to go off on his own and today it is going very well for him. 

From what he invests, he makes a 30 to 40 % profit, so it is very profitable. He also has other income working with his spouse. In the future, he hopes to open a workshop in the city and avoid having to wait for the orders to be sent from Lima. This will be his second loan with MFP and he hopes to have your cooperation to be able to continue with his goals.  He is also committed once again to making his payments on time, as with the previous loans he had. With the amount of 2000 soles that he has asked for, he will buy unformed gold and he will finish it and sell it.

loans.use: to buy gold to make jewelry.

loans.name: Nanci Judith

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal María Monserrate se reúne cada quince días en la ciudad de Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía, que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.

En este lugar vive la señora Nanci, ella tiene 57 años de edad, está casada y fruto de esta relación tiene cuatro hijos, dos mayores de edad e independientes y los dos menores de edad aun viven con ella y estudian en colegio. Su marido es chofer. Ella es licenciada en Ciencias DE La Educación.
 
Ella trabaja de  maestra en una escuela de la localidad, pero también se dedica al comercio, vende semijoyas de Romanel y productos Yanbal (productos de belleza, cosméticos, perfumería y accesorios para damas), trabaja todos los días en todas sus actividades, sus productos los vende los últimos días de la semana aunque también les vende a sus compañeras de la escuela, deja a crédito y cobra cada fin de semana, lleva en este negocio por más de 12 años y estos productos los compra en una distribuidora en Manta.

Este crédito es justamente para comprar semijoyas de Romanel como: cadenas, pulseras, collares y cosméticos de Yanbal. Está en el Banco Comunal 13 años y le gusta por los beneficios que brinda la institución. 

Sus metas son seguir trabajando y ampliar su negocio.
texts.en:
The communal bank María Monserrate meets twice a month in the city of Montecristi, known for its rich pre-colonial culture and for its handicrafts, that are recognized nationally and internationally. This is where the famous straw hats come from.

In this place lives Nanci. She is 57 years old. She is married and from this relationship she has 4 children. Two are older and independent and the two younger ones are still living with her and they are school students. Her husband is a driver. She has a degree in Education. 

She works as a teacher in a neighborhood school, but she also is a merchant, selling the brand of Romanel jewelry and Yanbal (beauty products, cosmetics, perfumes and ladies accessories), working every day in all her activities. She sells her merchandise at the end of the week but she also sells them to her school colleagues, giving them credit and collecting payment every weekend. She has been in this business for more than 12 years and she buys her merchandise from a distributor in Manta.

This loan is just in order to buy Romanel jewelry such as chains, bracelets, and necklaces and cosmetics from Yanbal. She has been with the communal bank for 13 years and she is happy for the benefits that the institution has given her.

Her goals are to continue working and to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy chains, bracelets, necklaces and cosmetics

loans.name: William Alexander

texts.es:
William, necesita un nuevo préstamo para el pago de una maquina desgranadora de maíz, ya que esta le es muy útil para poder agilizar la preparación de la cosecha y venderla a los clientes.
Él ha utilizado de estos préstamos para invertirlo en insumos, que hasta el momento le han ayudado para que sus cultivos sean sanos y abundantes, en su familia todos están bien solamente apoyándole en su trabajo.
texts.en:
William needs a new loan to be able to pay for a machine to remove the kernels from ears of corn.  This type of machine is very helpful for speeding up processing the harvest for selling to customers.

He’s made use of these loans for supplies in the past and they’ve helped his crops to be healthy and abundant.  His family is well and they help him with his work.

loans.use: to buy a processing machine.

loans.name: Elsa Guadalupe

texts.es:
Elsa Guadalupe, tiene 40 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene dos hijos, quienes están estudiando, vive en Cofradia, Cortes.
Doña Elsa, hace 4 años se gana la vida elaborando comidas rápidas y típicas como nacatamales, baleadas (tortilla de harina con frijoles, queso, mantequilla y huevo), pastelitos de carne, enchiladas, tacos, tortilla con quesillo y refrescos. Estos productos los vende en una glorieta (cocina) de la escuela. Vende durante todo el año escolar y los meses de vacaciones de los estudiantes ella elabora nacatamales en su casa. Los nacatamales es una comida que tiene gran demanda en este país, son muy ricos elaborados con harina de maíz, rellenos de carne, papas, arroz, chicharos y condimentos. Es un negocio rentable.
Este préstamo es el noveno que ha solicitado a ODEF. El que ha solicitado actualmente es para comprar, ingredientes para hacer nacatamales, como harina de maíz, carne, verduras y condimentos.
A crecido su negocio, ella empezó vendiendo refrescos y ahora es muy reconocida en la comunidad por los ricos nacatamales que vende. Su sueño es establecer otro puesto de venta.
texts.en:
Elsa Guadalupe, 40, is a single mother; she has two children attending school.  She lives in Cofradía, Cortes.

Elsa has been earning her livelihood selling fast food and traditional dishes like nacatamales [Nicaraguan-style tamales], baleadas (flour tortilla with beans, cheese, butter and egg), meat pies, enchiladas, tacos, tortilla with cheese and soft-drinks.  She sells these items at a school snack bar.  She sells during the entire school year and on student vacation times she makes nacatamales at home.  Nacatamales are a food that is in high demand in this country.  They are very delicious and made from corn flour stuffed with meat, potatoes, rice, peas and condiments.  It is a profitable business.

This is the 9th loan she’s asked for at ODEF.  The one she’s asked for on this occasion is to buy ingredients to make nacatamales like corn flour, meat, vegetables and condiments.

Her business has grown.  She started selling soft-drinks and now she is very well-known in her community because of the delicious nacatamales she sells.  Her dream is to set up a second sales point.

loans.use: to buy corn flour, rice, meat, potatoes, condiments and peas to make nacatamales to sell.

loans.name: Dinora Delmi

texts.es:
Dinora, se encuentra solicitando nuevamente un préstamo, por la necesidad de invertir más en el negocio, además recibió una buena atención, lo que la motivo a seguir trabajando, actualmente comprara maíz, frijoles, aceite, boquitas, galletas, gaseosas, jugos, entre otras.
El préstamo anterior le permitió a Dinora surtir el negocio, crecer y sobre todo brindar una buena atención y servicio a los clientes. Las condiciones con su familia han mejorado ya que tienen más clientes que atender.
texts.en:
Dinora is asking for a new loan because she needs to invest more in her business.  She got good service before and this motivated her to continue working.  She will buy corn, beans, cooking oil, snacks, cookies, and soft drinks, among other things.

Her previous loan allowed her to stock her store, grow it, and above all provide good attention and service to her customers.  Conditions have improved for her family now that she has customers to attend to.

loans.use: to stock her store

loans.name: Margarita Del Rocio

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal María Monserrate se reúne cada quince días en la ciudad de Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía, que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.

En este lugar vive la señora Margarita, ella tiene 41 años de edad, está casada y fruto de esta relación tiene cuatro hijos, dos mayores y dos de 17 y 9 años de edad,  ambos estudian  en colegio y el menor en escuela y aun viven con ella, los mayores ya son independientes.  Su esposo es albañil.

Ella es una ama de casa para obtener sus propios recursos y con estos ayudar a  sus hijos con los gasto de los estudios se dedica al comercio, vende ropa y su forma de venta es puerta a puerta, también vende productos de la marca Avon (productos de belleza, cosméticos, perfumería, y accesorios para damas), estas ventas olas realiza al mismo tiempo que hace la venta de ropa. Trabaja 4 días a la semana sobre todo por las mañanas, deja a crédito y cobra los fines de semana. Su mercadería la compra en Picoaza.

Este crédito es para comprar ropa, cremas y perfumes, bisutería. Lleva casi dos años en el Banco Comunal y le gusta por la rapidez para conseguir los créditos.

Su sueño es tener un bazar en su casa.
texts.en:
The members of the María Monserrate communal bank meet every two weeks in the city of Montecristi, known for its rich pre-colonial culture, and it’s nationally and internationally known arts.  This is the place of the famous straw hats.

Margarita is 41 years old and lives here.  She’s married and has four children, two are grown up and on their own, and the others are 17 and 9.  Both attend school and still live at home.  Her husband works as a mason.

She’s a housewife, but sells Avon products (beauty products, cosmetics, perfumes, and ladies’ accessories) in order to obtain her own income and be able to help her children with their schooling expenses.  She also sells clothing and works four days a week, mostly in the mornings.  She sells on credit and collects on the weekends.  She buys her merchandise in Picoaza.

She will use the money from this loan to buy creams, perfumes, and costume jewelry.  She’s been a member of the communal bank for two years and likes how quickly she can get the loans.  Her dream is to have a store within her home.

loans.use: to buy inventory.

loans.name: Cesar Augusto

texts.es:
el señor Cesar Augusto es una persona casada, tiene 40 años de edad, cursó los estudios de educación básica, se dedica a prestar servicios de transporte como al comercio, en el comercio lleva 3 años de experiencia, iniciando este trabajo por iniciativa propia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposa quien se dedica a los oficios domésticos.

Solicita un préstamo para utilizarlo para la compra ropas para mejorar sus venta, compra de suéteres, lencería, playeras, bufandas, chumpas, guantes, etc. Espera en el futuro tener un negocio prospero.
texts.en:
Cesar Augusto is 40 years old, married, and has a basic education.  He provides transportation services to businesses and also has his own business.  He’s been doing this for three years and started through his own initiative.  He has his wife’s support.  She’s a housewife.

He’s asking for this loan to buy clothing to increase his sales.  He’ll buy sweaters, lingerie, t-shirts, scarves, gloves, etc.  He hopes to have a prosperous business in the future.
.

loans.use: to stock his business

loans.name: William Israel

texts.es:
William, se ha decidido por un nuevo préstamo para invertirlo en la reparación del techo de su vivienda y otra parte para la educación de sus hijos,
Él ha tenido buena experiendia en los préstamos anteriores, le ayudaron mucho pues logro las metas que tenia y pudo sacar adelante a su familia. Su vehiculo esta en buenas condiciones con la reparacion que le realizo, espera continuar de esta manera trabajando con la institucion.
texts.en: William has decided to take out a new loan to invest in the repair of the roof on his home and in his children's education.  He has had a good experience with his previous loans; they helped him a lot as he was able to reach the goals he set and he was able to get his family ahead.  His car is in good condition thanks to the repairs he made on it and he hopes to be able to keep working with this institution.

loans.use: to repair the roof on his home

loans.name: Liliana Elizabeth

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal María Monserrate se reúne cada quince días en la ciudad de Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía, que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Liliana, tiene 27 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen dos hijos de 8 y 2 años  de edad, la mayor estudia en escuela. Su esposo es comerciante de pescado.

Ella es una muy buena madre y ama de casa que además se dedica a la venta de ropa de todo tipo, su forma de  venta es puerta a puerta y también vende en su  casa hasta donde llegan sus clientes pero solo los más conocidos. Trabaja tres días de la semana más que todo por las mañanas ya que aprovecha que una de sus hijos esta en escuela y así puede recorrer sus productos con más tranquilidad, ella  deja a crédito a sus clientes  y cobra cada quince días. Su mercadería  la va a comprar en  Guayaquil cada vez que necesita. Tiene 4 años que se dedica a esta actividad y le va muy bien.

Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar más mercadería como: pantalones, blusas, camisetas y ropa de niños. Este es su tercer ciclo en el Banco Comunal y le gusta por la ayuda que recibe del banco. 
 
Sus deseos son seguir adelante en su negocio y en su vida familiar.
texts.en:
The María Monserrate Communal Bank meets every 15 days in the city of Montecristi, which is known for its rich precolonial culture and its handicrafts, which are known both nationally and internationally.  It is also the home of the famous Panama hats.

This is where we met Liliana.  She is 27 years old, married, and has two children who are eight and two years old.  The eldest is in school.  Her husband sells fish for a living.

She is a very good mother and housewife who also sells all kinds of clothing for a living.  She sells door-to-door and she also sells from her home, but only to the customers she knows best.  She works three days a week, mainly in the morning to take advantage of the fact that one of her children is in school.  This way she is able to take her products out at her own pace.  She keeps tabs for her customers and charges them every 15 days.  She goes to Guayaquil to buy her merchandise whenever she needs it.  She has been doing this for four years and it has been going very well for her.

She will use this loan to buy more merchandise, such as pants, blouses, shirts, and children's clothing.  This is her third cycle with her communal bank and she likes it because of the help she receives from the bank.

Her wishes are to get ahead in her business and in her home life.

loans.use: to buy pants, blouses, shirts, and children's clothing

loans.name: Mirna Jeannette

texts.es:
Mirna, ha cancelado en su totalidad el préstamo anterior, con la intensión de obtener uno nuevo para la compra de jarcia, lazos de colores, canastos, cáñamos, entre otros productos que necesita, con ellos surtira el negocio de nueva mercaderia y espera que esta nueva inversión sea provechosa y pueda ser buena cliente en los pagos.
Ella está con deseos de continuar siendo buena cliente y que su negocio crezca.
texts.en:
Mirna has canceled her entire previous loan because she wants to get a new one to buy rope, colored ribbon, baskets, and canvas, among other products she needs.  These will supply her business with new merchandise and she hopes that this new investment will be profitable and that she will be a good, paying customer.

She wants to continue to be a good customer and she wants her business to grow.

loans.use: to buy ribbon, baskets, and canvas

loans.name: Maria Albertina

texts.es:
La señora Maria Albertina es casada, tiene 30 años de edad, cursó los 6 años de educación primaria, tiene 1 hijo, se dedica a la artesanía, específicamente en la tejeduría de cortes típicos, inició este trabajo gracias al apoyo de su hermana, y hasta el momento lleva 8 años de experiencia.

solicita un prestamos que lo utilizara para la compra de hilo y poder producir mas, espera en el futuro mejoras su negocio y que sea prospero.
texts.en:
Maria Albertina is 30 years old, married, and has one child.  She has a sixth-grade education and she makes handicrafts for a living.  Specifically, she weaves traditional fabrics.  She started this work thanks to the help of her sister, and she currently has eight years of experience.

She is asking for a loan to buy thread to be able to produce more.  In the future, she hopes to improve her business and make it profitable.

loans.use: to buy thread for weaving

loans.name: Enrique Tomás

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal María Monserrate se reúne cada quince días en la ciudad de Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía, que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.ç

En este lugar conocimos a Don Enrique, tiene 56 años de edad, está casado y de esta relación tienen tres hijos, todos mayores de edad y dos de ellos aun vive con él. Su esposa es una gran ama de casa.

Él para sacar adelante a su familia se dedica al comercio, vende pescado, para lo cual todos los días se desplaza en la madrugada a las playas de la ciudad de Manta y allí compra el mejor pescado a los pescadores que llegan hasta este lugar, y luego  recorre con sus productos por toda la ciudad de Montecristi y sitios cercanos, el realiza sus ventas en  un carro de su papá que le presta para que él se pueda ganar la vida, lleva en este negocio 20 años y es así como siempre le ha llevado el pan a su mesa para que a su familia no le faltara nada.
  
Esta repitiendo el crédito ya que necesita comprar mucho mas pescado para la venta diaria, por que sus ventas an aumentado y por lo tanto sus ganancias, con las cuales ha mejorado su situación económica y el bienestar de su familia. Lleva tres años  en el Banco Comunal y le gusta por la ayuda que recibe del banco.
  
Su sueño es comprar un carro para realizar sus ventas en su propio transporte.
texts.en:
The María Monserrate Communal Bank meets every two weeks in the city of Montecristi. It is known for its rich pre-colonial culture and for its handicrafts, which are recognized on a national and international level. The famous Panama hats are from this place.

This is where we meet Enrique, age 56.   He is married and has three children; all of them are grown. Two of them still live with him.  His wife is a great housewife.

In order to get his family ahead he sells fish.  In order to do so every day at daybreak he goes to the beaches in the city of Manta.  That is where he buys the best fish from the fishermen who come to this place. He then takes his products all over the city of Montecristi and places that are nearby.  He makes his sales in a car that his father lends him so that he can earn a living.  He has been in this business for 20 years.  This is how he has always put food on the table so that his family does not lack anything.

He is getting another loan because he needs to buy much more fish for the daily sales.  His sales are increasing, and therefore his income is as well.  With the sales he has improved his financial situation and the well-being of his family.  He has been in his communal bank for three years.  He likes it because of the help he gets from the bank.

His dream is to buy a car in order to make his sales using his own transportation.

loans.use: to buy fish.

loans.name: Rosa Cristina

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal María Monserrate se reúne cada quince días en la ciudad de Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía, que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.

En este lugar conocimos a La señora Rosa, tiene 48 años de edad, es madre soltera de dos hijos de 16 y 14 años que estudian en colegio.  Vive en la casa de los padres.

Ella para obtener sus propios recursos y así sacar adelante a sus hijos, junto  a su hermana tienen un negocio de  compra y venta de pescado para lo cual cuatro veces a la semana se desplaza hasta las playas de la ciudad de Manta a comprar el mejor pescado, luego lo limpia y lo envía  a las ciudades de Guayaquil y Quito. En Quito  su hermana se encarga de distribuir todo el pescado mientras que en Guayaquil tiene que ir personalmente a entregar, llevan en este negocio 16 años y les ha ido muy bien.

Este crédito lo va a invertir en comprar pescado. Está en el Banco Comunal casi desde el inicio  y le gusta porque con los créditos ha podido sacar adelante  a sus hijos. 

Ella esta repitiendo el crédito ya que necesita el dinero para cumplir con sus clientes ya que ahora también envían a la ciudad de Quito, en si su negocio está creciendo más cada dia y ganando mas clientela, con esto ella puede solventar los gastos y darles lo mejor a su familia.

Su sueño es comprar un carro para llevar sus productos en su propio vehículo y así no tener que pagar fletes ya que esto le disminuye sus ganancias.
texts.en:
The María Monserrate communal bank meets every two weeks in the city of Montecristi, which is known for its rich pre-colonial culture and for its crafts that are recognized at the national and international level. It is the land of the famous Panama hat.

In this place we meet Rosa, 48 years old. She is a single mother of two children, 14 and 16 years old, who are students. She lives in her parents' house.

In order to have her own resources and thus move her children ahead, she and her sister have a business buying and selling fish. Four times a week, they go to the beaches in the city of Manta to purchase the best fish, which they then clean and send to the cities of Guayaquil and Quito. In Quito her sister is responsible for distributing all the fish, while in Guayaquil she has to go personally to deliver. They have been in this business for 16 years and it has gone very well for them.

She will use this loan to buy fish. She has been in the communal bank almost since the beginning, and she likes it because with the loans she has been able to move her children ahead.

She is getting another loan because she needs the money to fulfill her obligations to her customers now that they also send to the city of Quito. The business itself is growing more every day and winning more customers. With this, she can pay her expenses and give her family the best.

Her dream is to buy a car in order to carry her products in her own vehicle and thus not have to pay freight charges, since that reduces her profits.

loans.use: to buy fish.

loans.name: Martha

texts.es: Martha, de 30 años, es una mujer buena y amable, es conviviente con su pareja con quien tiene dos hijos de 13 y 07 años, tiene una casa propia en donde comparte sus días a lado de su pareja y sus dos hijos quienes son su razón de esfuerzo, trabajo y sacrificio. El trabajo de Martha consiste en lea venta de abarrotes en general, tiene una tienda en su casa que es muy visitada ya que esta ubicada en una calle muy concurrida, además de tener fácil acceso, ella vende de todo y los clientes van muy a menudo por que saben que encontraran ahí de todo y a un bajo precio, al principio cuando indicio su trabajo vendía pocas cosas y en cantidades pequeñas, poco a poco fue creciendo y ahora tiene una tienda de abarrotes grande, trabaja sola y le esta yendo muy bien ya que gana bien pero se esfuerza mucho también. Al principio tubo la dificultad de conocer muy bien su trabajo, lleva realizándolo por tres años y este tiempo aprendió muchas cosas para así tener mejores ingresos y manejar mejor su negocio, tiene muchos planes a futuro pero el principal es de poder agrandar su tienda. Este será el crédito número 3 con MFP, por ellos espera de su colaboración para que pueda concretar sus planes, por otro lado se compromete una vez mas de cumplir con el pago de cuotas, como en anteriores créditos que tuvo, además esta muy contenta de pertenecer a su banco comunal ya que todos sus integrantes son muy responsables y solidarios. Con el monto solicitado 1500 soles, comprará productos para su tienda, entre las cosas que comprará serán abarrotes, pasamanería y algunos otros que le piden a menudo en su tienda.
texts.en: Martha, 30 years old, is a good and kind woman. She lives with her partner, with whom she has two children, 7 and 13 years old. She has her own house where she spends her days at the side of her partner and their two children, who are her reason for effort, work, and sacrifice. Martha's business is selling general groceries. She has a store in her house that is very popular, since it is located on a very busy street. In addition to being easy to reach, she sells everything, and her customers come in very often because they know they will find everything there and at a low price. At first when she started her work, she sold few things, and in small quantities. Little by little her business grew, and now she has a large grocery store. She works alone, and it's going very well for her since she earns a lot, but she works a lot, too. At the beginning she had the difficulty of learning her business very well. She has been in this business for three years, and in this time she learned many things in order to increase profits and better manage her business. She has many plans for the future, but the principal one is to expand her store. This will be her third loan with MFP, so she hopes for your collaboration so that she will be able to realize her plans. On the other hand, she promises again to make her payments on time, as with previous loans she has had. She is also very happy to belong to her communal bank, since all of its members are very responsible and supportive. With the amount requested of 1500 soles, she will buy products for her store, among them groceries, personal accessories and office supplies, and other items that people often ask for in her store.

loans.use: to purchase products to supply her store.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es: Rosa, de 65 años, es una mujer buena y muy amable, es madre de cuatro hijos quienes ya son mayores, ella vive a lado de su esposo, con quien comparte todos sus días de trabajo y esfuerzo para poder brindarle una mejor calidad de vida. El trabajo de Rosa consiste en la venta de golosinas, tiene un pequeño puesto en su casa en donde coloca todas las variedades de golosinas existente para ofrecer a sus diferentes clientes, empezó vendiendo solo caramelos, pero poco a poco creció y ahora ofrece mayor variedad. Tiene a su lado a su esposo quien es su fiel compañero y con quien trabajó mucho para brindar educación a sus hijos. Le esta yendo muy bien ya que vende mucho en la época escolar, ella como toda mujer buena y con ganas de superarse tiene muchos proyectos en mente, aún tiene una edad avanzada desea seguir creciendo con su negocio y empezar a vender mayor variedad de cosas. Este será el primer crédito con MFP, esta muy contenta de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá segura de avanzar con su negocio, por otro lado se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas, esta muy contenta de pertenecer a su banco comunal ya que todos son muy amables y personas que se solidarizan entre si. Con el monto solicitado 1000 soles, comprará golosinas y algunos otros productos para empezar a vender mayor variedad en su pequeño puesto.
texts.en: Rosa, 65 years old, is a good, very kind woman.  She is the mother of four children who are now grown.  She lives at her husband's side, with whom she shares each day of work and struggle in order to be able to provide a better quality of life.  Rosa's work consists of selling snacks.
